English: Daily
Simplified_Chinese: 日常

English: Save the Garden! (Part 1)
Simplified_Chinese: 拯救遗址大作战 一

English: The Garden of Rhisis is dying! Could you help me?
Simplified_Chinese: 莱斯庭院快要荒废掉了，为了拯救莱斯庭院，需要找到生命之茶，但之前必须要收集10个碑石工匠的匠人之心。

English: You need 10 Bearer Hearts from Tombstone Bearers to save the Garden of Rhisis.
Simplified_Chinese: 你需要从碑石工匠那里获得 10 个匠人之心来拯救莱斯庭院。

English: Thank you!
Simplified_Chinese: 谢谢你！

English: If you change your mind later, please come back to me!
Simplified_Chinese: 好不容易才帮她弄到了匠人之心，还以为事情就结束了，没想到她还让我去找珍妮，看来想拯救遗址也不是件容易的事。

English: Thank you! You should really talk to Janne.
Simplified_Chinese: 谢谢你！你真的应该和珍妮聊聊！

English: Come back when you have the Bearer Hearts.
Simplified_Chinese: 当你得到匠人之心后，再回来找我。

English: Save the Garden! (Part 2)
Simplified_Chinese: 拯救遗址大作战 二

English: You have a message from my sister!
Simplified_Chinese: 听说有一个神秘的装饰品叫做骨质御碗，它的来历也非常奇特，据说是怪物和人类爱情的结晶。听说现在由金贝利来保管。

English: I see. The Garden of Rhisis is dying... Could you inform my sister Kimberley?
Simplified_Chinese: 我知道了。瑞希思的花园快要枯萎了，能请你去告诉我的姐姐金伯利吗

English: The problem with the Garden of Rhisis can wait. I guess...
Simplified_Chinese: 我认为，莱斯庭院的问题可以往后稍稍

English: Thank you from bringing me this message. I think you should talk to Marche in Eastern Flarine.
Simplified_Chinese: 谢谢你告诉了我这个消息。我认为你应该去帕里镇东边的玛尔琪聊聊。

English: You still haven't found Kimberley? She is in Saint City.
Simplified_Chinese: 你还没有找到金伯利吗？她在晨光镇

English: Save the Garden! (Part 3)
Simplified_Chinese: 拯救遗址大作战 三

English: The Saint City sisters say that the Garden of Rhisis is dying.
Simplified_Chinese: 将匠人之心和骨质御碗送给了玛尔琪，她就把散发着奇妙香味的生命之茶拿给了我，并让我回送给安妮。真是很香啊～不知道这东西可不可以吃呢？

English: Could you bring a Live Tea to Ann? You can find it the east of the Leren Mountains.
Simplified_Chinese: 你能给安带来一杯生命之茶吗？你可以在乐雅山脉的东边找到安。

English: Thank you! If you help her she will give you an Earring.
Simplified_Chinese: 谢谢！如果你帮助了她，她会送给你一副耳环

English: I will save the Garden of Rhisis with this tea! Here is an Earring to thank you.
Simplified_Chinese: 我会用这杯茶来拯救莱斯花园！送给你一副耳环，来表达我对你的感谢。

English: Bring a Live Tea to Ann at Saint City.
Simplified_Chinese: 将生命之茶带给晨光的安。

English: Find Santa's Socks!
Simplified_Chinese: 寻找圣诞袜

English: It is a sad Christmas here in Madrigal. Santa Claus has lost all of the stockings that hold the children's presents! We must find the red stockings!
Simplified_Chinese: 可怜的圣诞老公公，找不到遗失的圣诞袜…我来努力帮他找找吧！我想那些袜子应该是被怪物拿走了…

English: A Favor for the Pastor
Simplified_Chinese: 给牧师的爱心

English: The pastor would like me to deliver 20 bouquets! I wonder what the reward will be!
Simplified_Chinese: 华伦泰神父说，收集20束玫瑰花束给他，就会给我一个惊喜的礼盒！不知道开出来的东西是什么呢？

English: Give Back the Love.
Simplified_Chinese: 归还爱情

English: I have to gather 10 pieces of hearts. It's time to hunt some masquerpets.
Simplified_Chinese: 要搜集10个爱心碎片，去打猎吧。

English: Vagrant Master (Acrobat)
Simplified_Chinese: 初心者大师(弓箭手)

English: So you want to be an Acrobat, huh? You won't regret it! I have a simple test for you before starting the training. Are you ready? …hic!
Simplified_Chinese: 所以你想成为一名弓箭手喔？我发誓你绝对不会后悔的！在开始训练之前我有一个小测验给你，你准备好了吗？…嗝

English: Good luck! You'll need it!
Simplified_Chinese: 祝你一路顺风。

English: What are you afraid of? The path to become an Acrobat may be difficult for some, but it's so worth it! Come back if you change your mind, friend.
Simplified_Chinese: 你在害怕什么？在成为一名弓箭手的道路上的确有一些东西很困难，但是它值得呀！朋友如果你回心转意了请回来找我。

English: Well done. You've passed the first test!
Simplified_Chinese: 很好！你已经通过了测试。

English: I'm still waiting for you to hunt $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ Small Aibatts. If you want to become an Acrobat, you must complete this simple task.
Simplified_Chinese: 一定要猎杀$QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$只独眼蝠才可以，不然你无法成为弓箭手！

English: You have already chosen to pursue another path. I cannot help you any further. You can still cancel the other job quest in the Quest Window and come back to me.
Simplified_Chinese: 您已经选择了走另一条道路。我不能再帮助你了。你仍然可以在任务窗口取消其他职业任务然后在回到我这里。

English: For starters, let's go with something easy. I would like you to hunt $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s.
Simplified_Chinese: For starters, let's go with something easy. I would like you to hunt $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s.

English: Acrobat Weaponry
Simplified_Chinese: 弓箭手的武器

English: Now it's time for the next step on your path to becoming an Acrobat.
Simplified_Chinese: 你已经通过第一个测试了，辛苦你了！好，现在开始要进行第2个测试了！

English: I want you to return to collect 10 Twinkle Stones from Aibatts in the area, 5 Peakyrinds from Peakyturtles and 1 Slain from Lawolf.
Simplified_Chinese: I want you to return to collect 10 Twinkle Stones from Aibatts in the area, 5 Peakyrinds from Peakyturtles and 1 Slain from Lawolf.

English: Once you've gathered the Twinkle Stones, bring them to Pyre in the north of Flarine.
Simplified_Chinese: 收集完足够的发光石就把它们带给飞蕊吧，他就在帕里北广场。

English: Good luck! You're going to need it!
Simplified_Chinese: 祝你一路顺风喔～

English: You must like being a Vagrant. It would certainly be a shame if you quit now. I'll be here if you have a change of heart.
Simplified_Chinese: 你要继续当初心者吗？如果你这么觉得初心者好的话，我也没意见啦！可是、你要记住机会是很难得的喔！

English: Thank you for the Twinkle Stones, Apprentice. I will cover Acrobat weaponry with you now. Acrobats are able to wield both Bows and Yo-Yos.
Simplified_Chinese: 呵呵...看你拿这些东西来，这代表你已经通过训练了，我告诉你关于武器的事情好了。弓箭手的武器有2种，一种是飞轮、另一种是弓箭。

English: Bows are long range weapons that consume arrows for each shot. The strength of the basic shot is determined by how long you wait before releasing the arrow.
Simplified_Chinese: 弓箭是远程攻击武器，每一次射击都要消耗弓箭。基础射击的伤害取决于你释放攻击前的蓄力时间。

English: Yo-Yos are also long range weapons. However, the strength of the basic attack only changes depending on special skills used in conjunction with them.
Simplified_Chinese: 飞轮是可以双手使用，虽然没有阶段性的攻击，可是是一个很轻巧的武器喔～这样懂了吗？

English: If you met with Hent, then you should probably have something for me, hmm?
Simplified_Chinese: 嗯？你没有东西要给我吗？“亨特”没请你拿东西给我吗？

English: Gather 10 Twinkle Stones, 5 Peakyrinds and 1 Slain then deliver them to Acrobat Master Pyre near the Darken City Quest Office.
Simplified_Chinese: 搜集10个发光石，5个坚硬贝壳和一个狼趾甲，然后交给在达肯任务委托所旁边的弓箭手大师飞蕊。

English: Acrobat Skills
Simplified_Chinese: 弓箭手的技术

English: That about does it for Acrobat weaponry.
Simplified_Chinese: 关于武器的事情，你懂了吗？好吧！接下来是下一个训练。你知道“矮人族”这些家伙吧！他们会到“雨之河”来洗澡。

English: Now for the next step in your journey. I want you to travel to Flaris, and visit the High-Dwarpets. They have important information for you.
Simplified_Chinese: 可是啊～他们很会把东西弄丢，上次也是”哆卡”把《技能序章》给我弄丢了，你可以把这本书找去给他吗？

English: The High-Dwarpets can be found north of Flarine. Check your map (M Key) to find your way if you get lost.
Simplified_Chinese: 你把《技能序章》找给他的话，他应该会告诉你一些事情啦。你问我在哪找喔？这还要问吗？当然是“雨之河”啊！

English: Good luck, apprentice.
Simplified_Chinese: 祝你一路顺风啊～

English: What a shame to waste such potential. Come see me again if you change your mind.
Simplified_Chinese: 我想你应该对弓箭手不够了解啦！你如果懂弓箭手的魅力在那的话，不可能就这样放弃的。

English: Hmmm, has Pyre instructed you to see me? I see. Very well, I will continue your training. Listen up!
Simplified_Chinese: 呃….飞蕊大师让你过来见我的吗？好吧我知道了。听好了！接下来我会继续开展对你的训练。

English: Bows consume Magic Points (MP) and yo-yos consume Focus Points (FP). There are 6 special bow abilities and 7 special yo-yo abilities. I shall teach you a common Acrobat ability, Dark Illusion.
Simplified_Chinese: 弓箭的技能是消耗MP的，溜刃是消耗FP的，所以要记住喔。弓箭有6个技能，飞轮有7个技能，公用的有3个技能，我告诉你其中一个技能好了，就是有一个技能叫做“潜行”。

English: This ability allows you to vanish from sight. However, keep in mind that any actions performed while under the effects of this ability aside from movement will remove the effect. Take this.
Simplified_Chinese: 这是一个隐身的技能，如何？很赞吧！可是啊，你要攻击东西或是使用其他技能的话，这个技能会自动消失，注意这一点喔～还有这个东西你收下吧！要保管好喔～

English: It's interesting that you've come to see me. Did Pyre send you? If he did, you would have something for me.
Simplified_Chinese: 你会来找我真的很奇怪诶。飞蕊告诉过你吗？如果有的话，你肯定有一些东西要给我。

English: Visit High-Dwarpet Tucani in Flaris. He can be found north of Flarine. Check your map (M Key) to find your way if you get lost.
Simplified_Chinese: 去雨之河找《技能序章》之后，到莱乐安山脉找“哆卡”吧！他应该会告诉一些事情的。

English: An Acrobat's Duty
Simplified_Chinese: 弓箭手的任务

English: You've learned many things since your journey began.
Simplified_Chinese: 自从你的旅程开始后你已经学到了很多东西。

English: Now for the next step in your training. There is a creature named Shuraiture in the north of Flarine who is causing some trouble for residents there.
Simplified_Chinese: Now for the next step in your training. There is a creature named Shuraiture in the north of Flarine who is causing some trouble for residents there.

English: Shuraiture has been terrorizing some of the locals in Flaris. I want you to go there and put an end to him once and for all. Bring news of your victory to Tailer, the Acrobat Instructor in Flarine.
Simplified_Chinese: Shuraiture has been terrorizing some of the locals in Flaris. I want you to go there and put an end to him once and for all. Bring news of your victory to Tailer, the Acrobat Instructor in Flarine.

English: Good luck, you'll need it!
Simplified_Chinese: 加油！

English: What's the matter? Chicken?
Simplified_Chinese: 有什么事吗，胆小鬼？

English: Shuraiture is… no more? What great news! Thank you so much! I see that you've also spoken with Tucani. Here is your reward for defeating Shuraiture.
Simplified_Chinese: 休赖扎…不复存在了？多么好的一个消息！太感谢你了！我看到你已经和哆卡交谈过了，这是你击败休赖扎的奖励。

English: Acrobats are very versatile. We can fight at long range or in close quarters! We also have a special ability which allows us to pull an enemy target up close.
Simplified_Chinese: 弓箭手的能力很丰富，我们可以远距离攻击，也可以近距离对敌人绞杀。我们有一项特殊的能力就是可以将敌人拉进到身边进行攻击。

English: You've done well. I sense great potential in you. Congratulations, Acrobat!
Simplified_Chinese: 我想应该没有其他职业这么厉害啦～我相信你已经了解弓箭手了，希望你不要后悔你所选择的路。

English: Why have you come to see me? Did Tucani send you?
Simplified_Chinese: 找我有什么事？哆卡叫你来的吗？

English: There is a creature named Shuraiture in the north of Flarine. I want you to go there and put an end to him. Bring news of your victory to Tailer the Acrobat Instructor in Flarine.
Simplified_Chinese: There is a creature named Shuraiture in the north of Flarine. I want you to go there and put an end to him. Bring news of your victory to Tailer the Acrobat Instructor in Flarine.

English: Successor of the Hero - Master
Simplified_Chinese: 英雄的后继-大师

English: You think you have what it takes to be a successor of the Jester Hero? We will see…
Simplified_Chinese: 你认为你有能力成为暗杀者英雄的继承者吗？我们拭目以待…

English: Fine, I'll humor you. Slay $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s southwest of the Gouthan Mountains. They must be regular $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s, not the small or captain variety.
Simplified_Chinese: 好吧，就随你的意思。请去杀死$QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$个在永恒森林西南部的中型$QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$。请注意不能是小型的或者大型的种类。

English: Show me what you can do and I might consider allowing you to continue on the path of the Jester Hero.
Simplified_Chinese: 请给我看你的能力吧！

English: That's too bad because I sense potential in you. You must not be ready for the challenges that lie ahead. Come see me again if you change your mind.
Simplified_Chinese: 那太可惜了，因为我感觉到了你的潜力。如果你改变主意，请再来找我。

English: Not bad, Acrobat. Not bad at all. You may have something to offer. I'll allow your training.
Simplified_Chinese: 不错，弓箭手。 你有点东西。 我会允许你来训练。

English: I doubt you have what it takes to be a Jester if you can't even slay 20 Drillers.
Simplified_Chinese: 你没办法猎杀20只钻孔机回来的话，我也没办法帮你...

English: You are already on a different path. You cannot become a successor of the Jester Hero.
Simplified_Chinese: 你没资格走暗杀的路了...

English: I'll need to see what you can do before I'll allow your training. Slay $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s southwest of the Gouthan Mountains. They must be regular $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s, not the small or captain variety.
Simplified_Chinese: 在我允许你去训练之前，我需要知道你的实力。请杀死$QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$个在永恒森林西南部的中型 $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$怪物。请注意，不是小型或者大型的$QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$怪物。

English: Successor of Hero - Ring
Simplified_Chinese: 英雄的后继-戒指

English: Here is a Letter of Recommendation. You will need to give this to Radyon, the Jester Wise Man in Flaris.
Simplified_Chinese: 恭喜你通过测试。拿这个“推荐书”去[亡者之泉]找[暗杀贤者]拉迪温吧！

English: Radyon can be found at the Fountain of Dead Person north of the River of Weeping. Before meeting with him, you need to find the ring he lost and return it to him.
Simplified_Chinese: 不要与[大贤者]雷迪温搞混了喔。你要去找的是[亡者之泉]的[暗杀贤者]拉迪温喔！

English: Far to the south of Saint City, lies the Fantasy Desert. It is believed that a gentleman named Ren is in possession of the ring. Slay Ren and bring the ring to Radyon.
Simplified_Chinese: 你应该要去猎杀，晨光南部[梦幻沙漠]的“莲”，然后把“拉迪温”的戒指找回去给他吧！

English: I hope I'm right about you. Don't let me down!
Simplified_Chinese: 祝你一路顺风！

English: I guess I was wrong about you. You're not ready to walk the path of the successor of the Jester hero. See me again when you think you're ready.
Simplified_Chinese: 没信心吗？只要有信心没有不可能的任务啦！我相信你一定可以的！

English: Is that… the ring? My goodness, thank you so much! This ring belongs to the Jester Hero Curenen. Ren has always wanted to acquire this ring, or so the story goes.
Simplified_Chinese: 这就是…那个戒指吗？我的天，感激不尽！这个其实是暗杀英雄[凯奈]的戒指。[莲]为了得到它不择手段。

English: After the war ended, and Curenen passed on, Ren searched for this ring for hundreds of years. He finally discovered it a couple of years ago.
Simplified_Chinese: <凯奈>过世之后，他好像为了找这个戒指找了好几百年，总之～谢谢你啦！

English: Have you met Lorein? If you did, you should have something for me. Think carefully.
Simplified_Chinese: 你有见到<萝丽安>吗？那怎么什么都没带来呢？嗯...她应该会叫你拿东西给我的啊～仔细的想一下啦！

English: Meet with Radyon, the Jester Wise Man at the Fountain of Dead Person in Flaris. First though, slay Ren and get the ring from him. He can be found in the Fantasy Desert south of Saint City.
Simplified_Chinese: 你去<亡者之泉>找<拉迪温>吧！可是找他之前，你应该要先去猎杀，晨光南部<梦幻沙漠>的<莲>

English: Successor of Hero - Scroll
Simplified_Chinese: 英雄的足迹 - 卷轴

English: My sincerest gratitude once again for finding the ring. However, now I'll need you to take it to Saint City.
Simplified_Chinese: 真的很谢谢你帮我找回戒指...对了！你可能还要去找一个人。

English: Visit the Pepoview Troupe near the town square and speak with Clackcable. Present him with the ring and he will guide you from there. He may even give you something in return.
Simplified_Chinese: 你拿着这个戒指去晨光找<帕佩团>的克拉凯步吧！他一定会跟你说很多事情！

English: You possess great potential, young Acrobat. Keep working hard and you will realize your dream.
Simplified_Chinese: 做得好弓箭手，再加把劲。

English: Foolish Acrobat! Don't you realize your potential? See me again if you change your mind.
Simplified_Chinese: 愚蠢的弓箭手！你还没意识到你的潜力吗？如果你改变了你的想法，请再次来见我。

English: Thank you so much for finding the ring! We are performing the ancestral ceremony of Curenen. This ring will complete the ritual.
Simplified_Chinese: 啊...真的很感谢你啊～这个戒指是<凯奈>的遗物，我们家里祭拜着<凯奈>的灵骨呢...

English: Here, you certainly deserve this. It is the Successor Scroll of the Jester Hero.
Simplified_Chinese: 终于回来找我了啊...你一定有资格作暗杀的...我给你一个卷轴。

English: If you spoke with Radyon, didn't he ask you to bring me something? I'm sorry, I'm very busy and we don't have much more to discuss, I'm afraid.
Simplified_Chinese: 是[拉迪温]请你过来找我的吗？应该有东西要给我吧？抱歉，我很忙，恐怕我们没有过多的讨论时间。

English: Bring Curenen's ring to Clackcable of the Pepoview Troupe in Saint City.
Simplified_Chinese: 拿着戒指去晨光找，<帕佩团>的克拉凯步吧！

English: Successor of Hero - Altar
Simplified_Chinese: 英雄的足迹 - 祭坛

English: This scroll is the right of passage for those seeking to pursue the path of the Jester Hero. Please, take it and seek the Jester Priest in Darkon 3.
Simplified_Chinese: 这个卷轴是证明你有资格当暗杀的，拿着这个卷轴去找暗杀的祭司吧！

English: The Jester Priest can be found in Magmient in Southern Darkon 3. Present her with the scroll and she will recognize you as a successor to the Jester Hero.
Simplified_Chinese: 暗杀的祭司在熔岩火海地区。把这个拿去给她吧！

English: There is one thing you must do before you can speak with the Jester Priest. The Jewels of the Heroes adorn the Altar of Jester. One of these jewels was stolen a few days ago.
Simplified_Chinese: 你去找祭司之前有一件事情要请你先去做，最近暗杀集团的有一颗宝石被偷走了。

English: The jewels protect the soul of the Jester Hero, but they will not work if one of them is missing. The creature, Sisif, was seen near the alter a few days ago…
Simplified_Chinese: 如果英雄宝石中有一个缺失的话，就没办法发挥暗杀集团的能力。听祭司说最近祭坛附近出现了叫做西西普的家伙...

English: It is believed that this creature has stolen the jewel. Find Sisif and return the jewel to the Jester Priest, Homeit.
Simplified_Chinese: 祭司在怀疑是不是这个家伙偷走了英雄宝石，麻烦你去猎杀西西普看看是否他偷走的

English: Good luck, Acrobat!
Simplified_Chinese: 祝你一路顺风喔！

English: The jewel must be returned to the Altar of Jester. We need your help, Acrobat. Speak with me again when you are ready.
Simplified_Chinese: 嗯...不可以在这里放弃啦！在一点点就完成你的任务了。加油！

English: This is the Seal of Curenen and the Jewel of the Jester Hero. Thank you for returning this most prized artifact, Acrobat.
Simplified_Chinese: 这是凯奈的印章..英雄的宝石也在，果然是西西普偷走的。

English: Now we can protect the Soul of the Hero safely. I am in your debt.
Simplified_Chinese: 现在我可以安心的看守英雄的灵魂了，真的很感谢你！

English: I am waiting for someone who will bring me the Jewel of the Jester Hero. Do you have it?
Simplified_Chinese: 找我应该有其他事情才对啊？可是我看你不知道为了什么找我ㄟ～

English: Take the Successor Scroll of the Jester Hero, slay Sisif to retrieve the Jewel of the Jester Hero, and bring them both to the Jester Priest, Homeit.
Simplified_Chinese: 去猎杀西西普得到英雄的宝石，然后拿着卷轴去找达肯3的暗杀大师胡梅。

English: Successor of Hero - Guardian
Simplified_Chinese: 英雄的足迹 - 守护者

English: Great job, Acrobat. For the final leg of your journey, you must confront the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$.
Simplified_Chinese: 做得真棒，我的弓箭手。请以猎杀$QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$来结束你的旅程吧。

English: The will of the heroes is preserved in the Room of the Guardian in Guardiane. This is where you will find the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$.
Simplified_Chinese: 英雄的意志一直留存于圣堂的守护之室。你将会在那找到 $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$。

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ is a soul that protects the will of the heroes. Defeat him, and obtain the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.
Simplified_Chinese: $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ 是一直保卫着英雄意志的灵魂。请击败他，获取$QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$。

English: Take this. It is a Mark of the Hero. Once you have confronted the Venel Guardian and retrieved the Venel Heart, bring both of these to the Jester Guardian, Heingard.
Simplified_Chinese: 你得到这个心脏的话，他一定会承认你做暗杀，也就是说这是给你的最后一个考验了

English: I wish you luck, Acrobat.
Simplified_Chinese: 祝你好运，弓箭手

English: This is the final test to becoming a successor of the Jester Hero. You can't give up now. Speak with me again when you are ready to continue.
Simplified_Chinese: 这是成为暗杀的最后一步，现在放弃太可惜了。准备好后再来找我吧

English: Congratulations, young Acrobat. I've heard many great things about you. You've completed the final test. You will now become a Successor of the Jester Hero!
Simplified_Chinese: 欢迎你来到这里～你已经通过最后一个考验了，你现在成为真正的暗杀了！

English: Wise Curenen! This Acrobat wishes to follow your path! Grant them your blessing and courage, Jester Hero!
Simplified_Chinese: 暗杀的英雄<凯奈>啊～这里有一位勇士要追随你的后迹，请赐给他祝福的神力吧！

English: You have not completed the tasks given to you by the Jester Priest. Return to me when you have done so.
Simplified_Chinese: 你还没有完成之前的任务，完成后再来找我吧

English: Defeat the Venel Guardian, and deliver the Mark of the Hero and the Venel heart to the Jester Guardian, Heingard, in Guardiane.
Simplified_Chinese: 请你去<圣堂>找<海音卡萝德>，找到他之前你得先去<守护之室>杀死<贝纳卡度温>。

English: Successor of Hero - Master
Simplified_Chinese: 英雄的后迹-大师

English: You think you have what it takes to be a successor of the Ranger Hero? We will see…
Simplified_Chinese: 你认为你有能力成为游侠英雄的继承者吗？我们拭目以待…

English: Show me what you can do and I might consider allowing you to continue on the path of the Ranger Hero.
Simplified_Chinese: 我相信你的能力！

English: I doubt you have what it takes to be a Ranger if you can't even slay 20 Drillers.
Simplified_Chinese: 你没办法猎杀20只钻孔机回来的话，我也没办法帮你...

English: You've already chosen a different path. I cannot guide you on the path of the Ranger. You can still cancel the other job quest in the Quest Window and come back to me.
Simplified_Chinese: 你没资格走游侠的路了...

English: Successor of Hero - Letter
Simplified_Chinese: 英雄的足迹-信

English: Here is a Letter of Recommendation. You will need to give this to Kimel, the Ranger Wise Man in Flaris.
Simplified_Chinese: 恭喜你通过测试。拿这个“推荐书”去<亡者之泉>找游侠贤者<奇美>吧！

English: However, first you must retrieve the Letter of Hynan from Rubo, a creature found to be living with Syliacas, east of Darken. Locals caim Rubo has been seen with the letter.
Simplified_Chinese: 然而，首先你必须从路宝那里取回海楠的信，路宝是一种被发现于达肯东部的与食人鱼在一起的生物。 当地人声称路宝已经看了这封信。

English: Once you've slain Rubo, bring the Letter of Recommendation and the Letter of Hynan to Sage Kimel at the Fountain of Dead Person in Flaris.
Simplified_Chinese: 去猎杀路宝之后帮他把信件找回来吧！并把海楠的信交给位于帕里亡者之泉的贤者奇美。

English: Good luck to you, Acrobat.
Simplified_Chinese: 祝你一路顺风喔！

English: I guess I was wrong about you. You're not ready to walk the path of the successor of the Ranger hero. See me again when you think you're ready.
Simplified_Chinese: 没信心吗？只要有信心没有不可能的任务啦！我相信你一定可以的！

English: Is that… the Letter of Hynan? My goodness, this is wonderful! Thank you so much, Acrobat!
Simplified_Chinese: 那就是…[海楠]的信吗？我的天，太好了！谢谢你，弓箭手！

English: Hynan lost this letter during the war. There were rumors that a creature named Rubo was in possession of it. Thank you for retrieving it for me.
Simplified_Chinese: 海楠在战争中把这封信遗失，那之后听说被路宝偷走了!谢谢你为我找了回来。

English: My sincerest gratitude.
Simplified_Chinese: 真的很感谢你～

English: I'm waiting for someone to bring me a letter. There are rumors that a creature named Rubo who lives with the Syliacas east of Darken was last seen with it.
Simplified_Chinese: 我在等有人给我带来一封信。有传言说，名为路宝的生物正在和达肯东部的食人鱼一起生活。

English: You need to speak with Kimel, the Ranger Wise Man at the Fountain of Dead Person in Flaris. First, though, you must retrieve the Letter of hynan from the creature, Rubo, East of Darken.
Simplified_Chinese: 你去亡者之泉找奇美吧！可是找他之前，你应该要先去达肯东部猎杀路宝。

English: Many thanks for bringing me the Letter of Hynan! I would like you to deliver it to High-Dwarpet Liekyen.
Simplified_Chinese: 真的很谢谢你帮我找回海楠的信！我还希望你能把信带给高阶矮人族利绮安。

English: High-Dwarpet Liekyen can be found near the northwestern edge of town in Darken.
Simplified_Chinese: 你拿着这封信去达肯村庄的西北地区的入口找一个叫利绮安的高阶矮人族吧！

English: Hello, I am Liekyen. A former steward of the Hynan family. I now administer the keepsakes of the Hynan family. What have you got there?
Simplified_Chinese: 啊？这不是信件吗？哈哈～真的很感谢你啊！其实我以前是海楠的管家啦！最近我都在收藏他的遗物。

English: The Letter of Hynan?! This was the last lost keepsake of the Hynan family. How did you… no matter. The important thing is that it has been returned. I have been looking for this for a very long time.
Simplified_Chinese: 海楠的信？！这是海楠家族最后的纪念物了。你是怎么…无所谓了，现在最重要的是东西已经回来了。我真的已经找它找了太久了。

English: Now all of the keepsakes of the Hynan family are accounted for. Here, take this. This scroll will prove that you are ready to become a successor of the Ranger Hero.
Simplified_Chinese: 现在海楠家族的纪念物已经全部在这了。给你，拿好这个，这个卷轴能证明你已经可以成为游侠英雄的继承者。

English: I'm waiting for someone to deliver a letter to me. Do you have it? No? Then our business is concluded.
Simplified_Chinese: 我在等人送信。你有吗？没有？那么终止交易吧。

English: Take the Letter of Hynan to High-Dwarpet Liekyen in Darken.
Simplified_Chinese: 拿着海楠的信件去找达肯的高阶矮人族利绮安吧！

English: This scroll is the right of passage for those seeking to pursue the path of the Ranger Hero. Please, take it and seek the Ranger Priest in Darkon 3.
Simplified_Chinese: 这个卷轴是证明你有资格当游侠的，拿着这个卷轴去找游侠的祭司吧！

English: Rupin, the Ranger Priest, can be found in Aniceknight in northern Darkon 3. Present her with the scroll and she will recognize you as a successor to the Ranger Hero.
Simplified_Chinese: 游侠的祭司在“阴森林”地区。把这个拿去给她吧！

English: There is one thing you must do before you can speak with the Ranger Priest. Pranksters in the Garden of Rhisis have stolen the 8 books of the History of Heroes.
Simplified_Chinese: 你去找祭司之前有一件事情要请你先去做，听说莱斯庭院的“小丑实习生”把“英雄史记”全部偷走了。

English: These books detail the History of the Heroes and are very sacred us. Go now, to Rhisis, and do what you must to get these books back!
Simplified_Chinese: 这些书籍详述了英雄们的历史。现在就出发吧，去莱斯庭院，无论做什么你都一定要拿回这些书籍！

English: Good luck to you, Acrobat. May the Ranger Hero guide you. Speak with Rupin, the Ranger Priest in Aniceknight, once you've recovered the sacred texts.
Simplified_Chinese: 加油！不要死到喔～黑黑～

English: The books must be returned. We need your help, Acrobat. Speak with me again when you are ready.
Simplified_Chinese: 咦？你是笨蛋喔？在一点点就完成了，要在这里放弃吗？

English: What've you got there, Acrobat? A Stamped Scroll, and are those… they are! I can't believe it! The 8 lost books of the History of Heroes!
Simplified_Chinese: 弓箭手，你拿到了什么？一个被标记的卷轴，还有...就是它们！难以置信！8本遗失的英雄之书！

English: How did you ever… never mind! The important thing is that we have them back! We owe you our sincerest gratitude, young Acrobat!
Simplified_Chinese: 再一次的感谢你～

English: I'm waiting for someone who has allegedly found the 8 lost books of the History of Heroes. Is that you? No? Then we have nothing more to discuss.
Simplified_Chinese: 我一直在等待可以宣称找到了八本遗失英雄典籍的人。是你吗？不是？那我们没什么好说的了。

English: Bring the Stamped Scroll and the 8 lost History of Hero books to Rupim, the Ranger Priest in Aniceknight in Darkon 3.
Simplified_Chinese: 带着被标记的卷轴和8本遗失的英雄之书去达肯3的魔夜之森找[游侠祭司]芦苹吧。

English: Take this. It is a Mark of the Hero. Once you have confronted the Venel Guardian and retrieved the Venel Heart, bring both of these to the Ranger Guardian, Kailreard.
Simplified_Chinese: 你得到这个心脏的话，他一定会承认你做游侠，也就是说这是给你的最后一个考验了。

English: Congratulations, young Acrobat. I've heard many great things about you. You've completed the final test. You will now become a Successor of the Ranger Hero!
Simplified_Chinese: 欢迎你来到这里～你已经通过最后一个考验了，你现在成为真正的游侠了！

English: Wise Hynan! This Acrobat wishes to follow your path! Grant them your blessing and power, Ranger Hero!
Simplified_Chinese: 游侠的英雄海楠啊～这里有一位勇士要跟随你的后迹，请赐给他祝福的神力吧！

English: Defeat the Venel Guardian, and deliver the Mark of the Hero and the Venel heart to the Ranger Guardian, Kailreard, in Guardiane.
Simplified_Chinese: 请你去<圣堂>找<卡伊雷雅德>，找到他之前你要先去<守护之室>与<贝纳卡度温>对战才行。

English: The best wine, Beaujolais!
Simplified_Chinese: 最好的酒，博若莱！

English: Some of the grapes grown in Madrigal are used for wine. Especially the wines which are made from Flaris variety, Saint variety, Darkon variety are
Simplified_Chinese: 瑞加种植的一些葡萄是用于酿酒的。特别是由Flaris品种、Saint品种、Darkon品种酿制的葡萄酒，十分极品

English: named Beaujolais and you can get mysterious power when you drink them, according to the legend.
Simplified_Chinese: 据传说，它被命名为博若莱，饮用后可以获得神秘的力量。

English: It seems like these 3 kinds of grapes have a magical power from the earth. I studied them for a long time.
Simplified_Chinese: 这三种葡萄似乎具有来自大地的神奇力量。我对此已经研究了很长时间。

English: But we do not have these grapes right now, even though it is harvest season. The monsters came and took them all.
Simplified_Chinese: 但是我们现在没有这些葡萄了。怪物来把它们都抢走了。

English: Therefore we can not drink the wine that we have been waiting for. In addition the monsters will get the magical power. Would you bring the grapes back?
Simplified_Chinese: 因此，我们无法喝到期盼已久的酒。此外，怪物会获得神奇的力量。你可以把葡萄带回来吗？

English: Hmm... I cannot brew wine until the ban on making Beaujolais is lifted.
Simplified_Chinese: Hmm... I cannot brew wine until the ban on making Beaujolais is lifted.

English: Oh! I can brew a little bit of wine with these! Thank you. I want to reward you with 1 bottle of Beaujolais Flaris which was made from the grapes other adventurers brought.
Simplified_Chinese: 哦！我可以用这些酿造一点酒！谢谢你。我想奖励你一瓶由其他冒险者带来的葡萄制成的博若莱。

English: You can find out how it tastes, just try some yourself!
Simplified_Chinese: 自己尝尝就知道味道如何了！

English: Is this all? It is not enough to brew wine. I need $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$ grapes at least. Please!
Simplified_Chinese: 只有这些吗？这些是不够酿造葡萄酒的，请至少给我$QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$个葡萄。

English: ...And if you have the grapes from the other areas... you should deliver them to the person who brews wine in that area.
Simplified_Chinese: ...And if you have the grapes from the other areas... you should deliver them to the person who brews wine in that area.

English: Oh thank you. There are 3 kinds of grape divided by where they are grown. Please gather $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$ grapes of this area because I cannot brew wine with the grapes from other areas.
Simplified_Chinese: 噢，谢谢你。根据这些葡萄生长的地区，它们被分成了三类。因为我不能酿造来自其他地区的葡萄，请帮助我收集属于我所在地区的葡萄$QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$个。

English: Vagrant Master (Mercenary)
Simplified_Chinese: 初心者大师(战士)

English: What?! Hahaha! You think you have what it takes to be a Mercenary? Oh, that's good …hic! I think you'd be better off as a comedian!
Simplified_Chinese: 什么？哈哈哈哈哈哈！你认为你有成为战士的能力？喔..那很好…咳咳！我觉得你更适合做一个喜剧演员！

English: You're still here? Ugh… fine. I'll humor you just this once. If you think you are strong enough to be a Mercenary, then I'll need you to do a little something for me.
Simplified_Chinese: 你还在这？咳咳…好吧。我就开这一次玩笑。如果你认为你有能力成为一名战士，那么我需要你为我做点事情。

English: Small Aibatts have been infesting our crops just north of here. We need someone to go exterminate some of those filthy things.
Simplified_Chinese: 呵呵，我说的语言是上流人士才听得懂得语言啦。反正!从现在开始，你要去猎杀10只小独眼蝠回来!

English: Slay 20 Small Aibatts and 20 Small Mushpangs then return me when you are finished. Understand? Now get out of here, vermin!
Simplified_Chinese: 杀死20只小独眼蝠和20只小嘭嘭菇，然后当你完成后归还我，明白了吗？现在快离开这，小害虫!

English: Good luck, Vagrant. You'll need it! Hahaha!
Simplified_Chinese: 祝你一路顺风啦!哈哈哈!

English: I knew you were all talk, Vagrant. That's 30 seconds of my life I won't be getting back…
Simplified_Chinese: 也对啦，对你这种人来说应该是满难的啦!你以为我这个伟大的摸斯腾那么好欺负吗?

English: Hmmm, that's acceptable. Not bad, Vagrant! Although, I could have done it in half the time. But that's neither here nor there.
Simplified_Chinese: 哈哈哈，这种小事情如果叫我这个伟大的摸斯腾来做的话，不到2分钟就完成了。好啦!反正你已经通过测试了。

English: Hahaha! As if you could ever hope to compare yourself to me… Mustang the Great!
Simplified_Chinese: 但是，不要这么快就高兴了。不要以为伟大的玛斯滕会这样轻松的放过你啊!

English: What's the matter? You're not afraid of some Small Aibatts, are you?
Simplified_Chinese: 咋了？你不害怕小独眼蝠的对吧？

English: Alright, listen carefully. Just north of here, there are several Small Aibatts. Slay 20 of them with 20 Small Mushpangs and return to me. Got it?
Simplified_Chinese: 好吧，仔细听，就在这北边，击杀20只小独眼蝠和20只小嘭嘭菇。快去！

English: <Mustang mumbles something under his breath about you being… not so bright.>
Simplified_Chinese: 怎么这么没有头脑啊…哎.

English: I cannot train you to be a Mercenary. You have already chosen another path. You can still cancel the other job quest in the Quest Window and come back to me.
Simplified_Chinese: 你不是已经选择其他职业了吗?

English: Slay 20 Small Aibatts and 20 Small Mushpangs just north of Eastern Flarine and return to Mercenary Drillmaster Mustang.
Simplified_Chinese: 击杀20只小独眼蝠和20只小嘭嘭菇！完成后返回战士教官玛斯滕处。

English: Mercenary Arms
Simplified_Chinese: 战士的武器

English: I suppose you've proven you're not completely useless. On to the next task!
Simplified_Chinese: 虽然你很帅气的完成了第一个测试，但是不这样就结束了!听清楚我这个伟大的摸斯腾所说的话喔!

English: I want you to gather the materials needed for making the weapons of the Mercenary. Try not to mess this one up, alright?
Simplified_Chinese: 第2个训练就是，要去找制作战士武器的材料。

English: Collect 10 Twinkle Stones from Aibatts in the area, 5 Chupims from Pukepukes and 1 Poporam from Doridoma. They should be relatively easy to find.
Simplified_Chinese: 材料是10个独眼蝠的发光石，5个邪精灵的坚果和1个蓝纹海马的紫晶球。这些材料很容易找到。

English: Once you've gathered enough Twinkle Stones, Chupims and Poporam, bring them to Andy the Mercenary Master in northern Flarine.
Simplified_Chinese: 一旦你收集到足够的发光石、坚果和紫晶球，就把它们带给帕里北部的战士大师安迪凯。

English: Good luck! You're gonna need it!
Simplified_Chinese: 祝你好运！你会需要它的！

English: Are you afraid of a couple Aibatts? I know they stink and all... but really?
Simplified_Chinese: 你害怕成群的独眼蝠吗？我知道他们非常的恶心而且都……但是你确定吗？

English: Great job acquiring the Twinkle Stones, Chupims and Poporam, Vagrant. Oh, and don't worry about old Mustang. He's all bark and no bite!
Simplified_Chinese: 收集发光石、坚果和紫晶球的差事很棒。初心者，不要担心玛斯滕，他只会叫，不咬人。

English: A Mercenary can use both swords and axes. They each have strengths and weaknesses. Swords strike fast, but deal only moderate damage, whereas axes deal heavy damage but at a moderate speed.
Simplified_Chinese: 战士可以同时使用剑和斧子，它们各有优劣。剑攻速更快，但是伤害适中，斧子伤害更高，但攻速略次，

English: Which weapon suits you best? That's a decision only you can make, young Vagrant.
Simplified_Chinese: 你最擅长哪个武器？年轻的初心者，这是你只有你才能做出的决定。

English: You need to acquire 10 Twinkle Stones, 5 Chupims and 1 Poporam before I can continue your training, Vagrant.
Simplified_Chinese: 你还没进行摸斯腾交代的事情吗?我总是告诉很多人，如果要得到东西，一定要付出代价。

English: Gather 10 Twinkle Stones from the Aibatts, 5 Chupims from Pukepukes and 1 Poporam from Doridoma then bring them to Andy, the Mercenary Master in northern Flarine.
Simplified_Chinese: 材料是10个独眼蝠的发光石，5个邪精灵的坚果和1个蓝纹海马的紫晶球。收集完材料后，去帕里北广场找战士大师安迪凯。

English: Mercenary Skills
Simplified_Chinese: 战士的技术

English: You've done very well so far, Vagrant. You are ready for the next step in your journey to become a Mercenary!
Simplified_Chinese: 你已经通过了第2项测试，但是这还不算完成。要成为真正的战士，需要很多的情报。

English: You must travel north, and visit the High-Dwarpets. Langdrong, one of the High-Dwarpets, will continue your training.
Simplified_Chinese: 我要告诉你的事情，已经讲完了。下一个考验是，你要学习关于战士的技术。你要去高阶矮人族的居住地。

English: High-Dwarpet Langdrong will educate you on Mercenary skills.
Simplified_Chinese: 到高阶矮人族的居住地，找一个叫做克罗的高阶矮人族，他会告诉你一些技术的相关知识。在那之前..

English: You can find the High-Dwarpets north of Flarine. Check your map (M Key) if you get lost.
Simplified_Chinese: 你可以在高阶矮人族的居住地找克罗。

English: I sense great potential in you, Vagrant. Luck be with you.
Simplified_Chinese: 祝你一路顺风

English: What a shame. Please see me again if you change your mind.
Simplified_Chinese: 要在这里放弃吗?都快结束了还要放弃，不绝得很可惜吗?

English: Where did you find that, Vagrant? Tell you what, for bringing this to me, I will go over one of the Mercenary Skills it details here. Listen up!
Simplified_Chinese: 初心者，你在哪找到它的？告诉你吧，有了你带来的这个东西，我要在这给你讲一下战士的详细技能。听好了！

English: As a Mercenary you can wield a weapon and a shield. The skill, Keenwheel, is a high damage spinning attack that can only be used after using the Slash skill and must be used in the Action Slot.
Simplified_Chinese: 作为一名战士，你可以挥舞武器进行攻击。切裂之风轮是一个高额转动伤害的技能，而且只能放在连续技能栏中，在结束逆手之回旋后使用。

English: Keenwheel is another example. Notice how the skills in the Skill Tree Window (K Key) are shaped like puzzle pieces? This is a good indicator of what skills can be used in what order.
Simplified_Chinese: 切裂之风轮是另外一个例子。请注意技能栏窗口（K键）是怎么像拼图一样排列的，这是一个很好的指引，表明什么技能可以按什么顺序使用。

English: If Andy sent you, then he should have given you some proof. Maybe you're forgetting something, friend?
Simplified_Chinese: .....你说是安迪凯叫你来的啊?拿证来!不然我怎么知道你说的事真的还是假的啊!!我现在很忙啦..我的技能序章到哪里去了呢..嗯..

English: Speak with High-Dwarpet Langdrong. He can be found with the other High-Dwarpets north of Flarine.
Simplified_Chinese: 到高阶矮人族的居住地找到克罗

English: Duty of Mercenary
Simplified_Chinese: 战士的任务

English: So... are you starting to understand how a Mercenary works now? Don't lose that Label of Technique I gave you!
Simplified_Chinese: 所以….你现在开始打算深入了解战士了吗？别把我给你的技艺签筏给丢了。

English: Now for your next test! There is a creature named Babari just south of Flarine terrorizing the citizens there. Slay him, and seek out Hyuit, the Mercenary Instructor in Eastern Flarine.
Simplified_Chinese: 啊，现在只要去找训练教官旁边的助教辉羽就可以了，这是最后一个考验了。不管他说什么你就听着吧!

English: Be careful, I hear Babari packs quite a punch!
Simplified_Chinese: 小心点，我听说巨眼小怪打人一击非常疼！

English: You can't give up now, Vagrant! You've come so far already!
Simplified_Chinese: 是吗?看你要不要继续做下去啦~反正对我来说无所谓啊!嘻嘻嘻。

English: The citizens of Flarine are in your debt, Vagrant! Now the children of Flarine can play outside without having to worry about being eaten by that big bully!
Simplified_Chinese: 它是一个很恶劣的怪兽，谢谢你帮我猎杀这个怪兽，最后一个考验是关于战士的任务，战士是使用近距离攻击

English: Mercenaries are experts at close combat. We have the ability to stop an enemy's movement in order to close distance and keep them in range. This ability is called, Sneaker.
Simplified_Chinese: 战斗时，都会在最前方进行攻击，通常是保护其他职业的角色，但是决不适合进行范围攻击。

English: Our main strength is in one on one combat. If we can get within range of an enemy, you can bet they are going to feel it the next day! Welcome to the fold, Mercenary!
Simplified_Chinese: 如果跟一群怪物战斗时，需要其他职业们的配合。恭喜你!完成了所有的考验，战士加油!

English: May I help you? I'm waiting for a pupil to take care of a little problem for me. I'm guessing that's not you? Then we have nothing further to discuss.
Simplified_Chinese: 有什么可以帮你的吗？我一直在等待一个能帮我处理一些小问题的学生。我猜那个人不是你吧？好吧那我们没什么好说的了。

English: Slay Babari and speak with Mercenary Instructor Hyuit in Eastern Flarine.
Simplified_Chinese: 啊，去找助教之前，听说帕里附近最近出现了一些巨眼小怪，好像在欺负人民呢~你去猎杀那个巨眼小怪之后拿给那个助教吧，知道吗?

English: Vagrant Master (Assist)
Simplified_Chinese: 初心者转职(圣职者)

English: So you want to be an Assist, huh? I don't blame you. It's the best job in Madrigal!
Simplified_Chinese: 所以你想成为一名圣职者，嗯哼？我不责怪你，圣职者是瑞加大陆最好的职业。

English: First, I want you to take care of a little something for me. Small Mushpangs have been eating our crops lately.
Simplified_Chinese: 现在开始要进行考验了，这个训练主要是，看你在初心者的时候，有没有努力的练功，也要见识一下你的速度。

English: Just north of here, there are several Small Mushpangs. Slay 10 of them with 10 Small Burudengs and return to me as soon as possible.
Simplified_Chinese: 从现在开始，你要去猎杀10只独小嘭嘭菇和10只小象牙甲虫回来!

English: Good luck, Vagrant!
Simplified_Chinese: 祝你好运，初心者！

English: Having a change of heart? That's alright, come speak to me again if you change your mind.
Simplified_Chinese: 想法有所改变了？没事，等你改变主意了再回来找我。

English: Excellent work! Hopefully they'll stay away from our crops now.
Simplified_Chinese: 厉害!但是不是这样就结束的，要成为一个真正的圣职者的话，还要接受很多的考验。

English: You've done very well so far. Keep up the good work!
Simplified_Chinese: 我相信你一定可以办得到的，有心理准备了吗?请你继续加油!

English: Hurry! There isn't much time!
Simplified_Chinese: 你所剩下的时间不多了，请你赶快去吧!不然时间会不够的!

English: You've already chosen another job. I can't help you any further. You can still cancel the other job quest in the Quest Window and come back to me.
Simplified_Chinese: 你已经选择了其他职业!

English: Slay 10 Small Mushpangs and 10 Small Burudengs just north of Eastern Flarine then return to Assist Drillmaster Elic.
Simplified_Chinese: 击杀10只小嘭嘭菇和10只小象牙甲虫，完成后去帕里东广场找圣职教官埃里克！

English: Arm of Assist
Simplified_Chinese: 圣职者的武器

English: You've done well so far, Vagrant. But I have another task for you if you are willing.
Simplified_Chinese: 厉害!你已经通过第一个考验了。但是不是这样就结束的，要成为一个真正的圣职者的话，还要接受很多的考验。

English: For your next task, I need you to gather some materials which are used to create Assist weapons.
Simplified_Chinese: 第2个训练就是，要去找制作战士武器的材料。

English: Retrieve 10 Forforms from Mushpangs, 5 Peakyrinds from Peakyturtles and 1 Poporam from Doridoma then bring them to Maki, the Assist Master in Northern Flarine.
Simplified_Chinese: 需要10个蘑菇孢子，5个坚硬背壳，1个紫晶球，然后把它们带给[圣职者大师]马奇。

English: The Assist Master is with the Madrigal Job Masters in North-Fl. Go!
Simplified_Chinese: 圣职者转职教官在挪斯布的瑞加大陆专业转职中心，没时间乱晃了，赶快出发吧!

English: I guess some people just aren't suited to be an Assist. That's alright, young one. Speak with me again if you change your mind.
Simplified_Chinese: 如果你要放弃的话，我一定会找你算帐的，知道了吗!

English: Thank you for delivering the Forform, Vagrant. Now, on to your next lesson. Assist weapons include Knuckles or Sticks.
Simplified_Chinese: 辛苦你了。从现在开始要仔细的听我所说的话。圣职者有2种武器，一个是拳套、另外一个是魔棒。

English: A Knuckle is a fist weapon used for close-quarters combat, and the Stick is used to perform certain Assist skills, such as healing.
Simplified_Chinese: 拳套是一种近战攻击武器，而魔棒则是施展一些圣职者技能用的，比如治疗。

English: It's important to remember that you must have the right weapon equipped to perform certain abilities. With enough practice, a good Assist can switch weapons in combat seamlessly.
Simplified_Chinese: 可以帮助其他玩家使用补助技能，也可以在自己使用拳套前，补助自己的功能，这样一来要快速的变换自己的武器，这才是重点。懂了吗?

English: I'm sorry, I'm waiting for someone to bring something very important. Is that you? I didn't think so.
Simplified_Chinese: 我很抱歉，我在等一个能帮我传递非常重要东西的人。你行吗？我可不这么认为。

English: Gather 10 Forforms from Mushpangs, 5 Peakyrinds from Peakyturtles and 1 Poporam from Doridoma then deliver them to Maki, the Assist Master in Northern Flarine.
Simplified_Chinese: 寻找材料!!10个蘑菇孢子，5个坚硬背壳，1个紫晶球。找到材料后，去找圣职者大师马奇。

English: Assist Skills
Simplified_Chinese: 圣职者的技术

English: Now that you have a good understanding of Assist weaponry, I'd like you to visit Goripeg, one of the High-Dwarpets north of Flarine.
Simplified_Chinese: 我要告诉你的事情，已经讲完了。下一个考验是，你要学习关于圣职者的技术。你要去找克利培，他在高阶矮人族的居住地。

English: High-Dwarpet Goripeg will give you information on Assist skills. He knows a lot about Assists and I think you are ready to speak with him.
Simplified_Chinese: 高阶矮人族会告诉你一些关于圣职者技能的信息。他很了解圣职者，我相信你准备好去见他了。

English: You can find the High-Dwarpets by opening your map (M Key). Go quickly, young one!
Simplified_Chinese: 到矮人族的居住地找克利培吧!

English: May Bubble protect you and guide you.
Simplified_Chinese: 祝你一路顺风

English: If you feel that you are not ready, young one, that is your decision. If you change your mind, come and speak with me again.
Simplified_Chinese: 要在这里放弃吗?都快结束了还要放弃，不绝得很可惜吗?

English: Erhm… hello there! You must be the young apprentice Maki spoke so highly of.
Simplified_Chinese: 啊?这是我弄丢的书耶，怎么找到的啊?反正谢谢你啦。为了报答你，送你一个礼物好了，我看一下喔~488页..

English: The blessing of Rhisis be with you, apprentice! I'd like to go over one of the Assist skills with you. Haste is a skill that you can cast on yourself or an ally.
Simplified_Chinese: 黎席斯的祝福使你的身体变的更轻盈，你想要什么就得到什么..嗯嗯，这是一个叫做高效术的技能，很厉害吧?

English: The Haste skill allows you to increase your attack speed and decrease your casting time, or that of a friend's, by a very large amount. It is an amazing skill!
Simplified_Chinese: 这个技能可以让你或其他人的速度加快并减少施法时间，幅度很大喔。这是一个很棒的技能。

English: Excuse me? I don't believe we have anything to discuss. Please leave me in peace.
Simplified_Chinese: 不好意思？我觉得我们之间没什么好谈的，请让我安静会。

English: Visit High-Dwarpet Goripeg north of Flarine. Check your map (M Key) if you get lost.
Simplified_Chinese: 到矮人族的居住地找克利培吧!

English: Duty of Assist
Simplified_Chinese: 圣职者的任务

English: Here… take this. It's a Label of Technique. It details what I've told you today.
Simplified_Chinese: 大概懂了吧?我给你的技能的小纸条绝对不可以弄丢，也不可以丢在地上啊!那是很重要的东西，不然我绝对部会负责啦!

English: Now, for the final leg of your journey, apprentice. A creature called Chaner has been terrorizing the locals near the Demians in Madren Town.
Simplified_Chinese: 啊，现在只要去找训练教官旁边的助教就可以了，这是最后一个考验了。不管他说什么你就听着吧!

English: Slay him, then return to Assist Instructor Kidmen in Eastern Flarine. She will conclude your Assist training.
Simplified_Chinese: 啊，去找助教之前，听说帕里附近最近出现了一些魔域怪，好像在欺负人民呢~你去猎杀那个魔域怪怪之后拿给那个助教吧，知道吗?

English: Good luck to you, apprentice!
Simplified_Chinese: 祝你一路顺风啊~

English: No? What a shame. Speak to me again if you have a change of heart.
Simplified_Chinese: 不吗？真丢人。如果你改变主意了再来找我。

English: Chaner is… gone? Great work! Now, listen carefully. I have something very important to tell you.
Simplified_Chinese: 毒蝎子…死了？干得好！现在，仔细听我说，我有一些非常重要的事要告诉你。

English: The role of an Assist on the field of combat is primarily party support, however, an Assist can also prove to be a potent fighter as well.
Simplified_Chinese: 圣职者是一个补助职业，但是也可以自己亲自战斗，可以在前方向战士一样进行近距离攻击，或在后面补助能力。

English: Congratulations, my friend! You are now an Assist! Welcome to the fold!
Simplified_Chinese: 圣职者是一个很重要的补助职业，恭喜你成为圣职者!所有考验结束了~圣职者万岁!

English: I'm waiting for word that Chaner has been destroyed. Last I heard he is still on the loose in Madren Town.
Simplified_Chinese: 你现在看不到我很忙吗?我不是解说员啦!没事的话请回吧!

English: Travel to Madren Town, east of the High-Dwarpets, and slay Chaner. Once Chaner is defeated, speak with Assist Instructor Kidmen in Eastern Flarine.
Simplified_Chinese: 啊，去找助教之前，听说最近迪米村附近出现了一些毒蝎子，好像在欺负人民呢~你去猎杀那个毒蝎子之后拿给那个助教吧，知道吗?

English: Vagrant Master (Magician)
Simplified_Chinese: 初心者转职(魔导士)

English: Are you intrigued by the art of magic? If you're speaking with me, you must be interested in becoming a Magician. I must warn you, it is not an easy road.
Simplified_Chinese: 你是否被魔法技能引起了深深的着迷？你现在在和我对话，想必你已经是对成为一名魔导士非常感兴趣了。但是我得提前告诉你，这绝不是一条轻松的道路。

English: Very well then, first, I would like you to perform a small task for me. Captain Aibatts have infested the area north of Eastern Flarine.
Simplified_Chinese: 现在开始要进行考验了，这个训练主要是，看你在初心者的时候，有没有努力的练功，也要见识一下你的速度。

English: If you're interested in helping, this little nuisance is just north of there. Will you slay 15 Captain Aibatts and 10 Small Burudengs to help us?
Simplified_Chinese: If you're interested in helping, this little nuisance is just north of there. Will you slay 15 Captain Aibatts and 10 Small Burudengs to help us?

English: Thank you! Good luck!
Simplified_Chinese: 我会看看你有多么厉害!

English: I see you're not ready to walk the path of the Magician. Very well, speak to me again if you change your mind.
Simplified_Chinese: 你要放弃了吗?对啦!要杀那么多的生命，不如早点放弃吧!

English: Great job, young Vagrant! I think you'll make a fine Magician.
Simplified_Chinese: 做得好，年轻的初心者！你会成为卓越的魔导士的

English: You must defeat 15 Captain Aibatts and 10 Small Burudengs to prove you are worthy of Magician training. I will not help you if you cannot even complete this simple task.
Simplified_Chinese: 击杀15只大独眼蝠和10只小象牙甲虫，如果无法完成这个简单的任务，我将不会帮助您。

English: I'm afraid you've already chosen a different job. We have nothing more to discuss. You can still cancel the other job quest in the Quest Window and come back to me.
Simplified_Chinese: 恐怕你已经选择了其他职业吧，我们没有什么可讨论的了。不过你仍然可以取消转职任务，然后再来找我。

English: Slay 15 Captain Aibatts and 10 Small Burudengs then return to Wingyei, the Magician Drillmaster in Flarine.
Simplified_Chinese: 杀死15只大独眼蝠和10只小象牙甲虫，然后回到帕里镇魔导教官那里。

English: Weapons of the Magician
Simplified_Chinese: 魔导士的武器

English: Nice work taking care of those Captain Aibatts for us. Now, on to your next task!
Simplified_Chinese: 为我们照顾那些大独眼蝠的工作做得很好。现在，继续你的下一个任务！

English: I need you to collect some materials for me and deliver them to Hee, the Magician Master. She will instruct you on the use of Magician weaponry.
Simplified_Chinese: 我需要你为我收集所有材料然后把它们带给魔法大师海恩。她会向你介绍魔法武器的用途。

English: Gather 10 Twinkle Stones from Aibatts near Flarine, 5 Chupims from Pukepukes and 1 Slain from Lawolf then you may speak with Hee.
Simplified_Chinese: 从帕里镇附近的独眼蝠那收集10个发光石，从邪精灵那收集5个坚果，从山地野狼收集1个狼趾甲，收集到这个材料后，去找魔导士大师海恩。

English: The Magician Master is located just north of Flarine.
Simplified_Chinese: 魔导士的转职教官，应该在帕里北广场，一定要拿这个材料喔!

English: Good luck to you, Vagrant!
Simplified_Chinese: 祝你好运，初心者！

English: I see you're not quite ready to continue down the path to becoming a Magician. Speak with me again if you change your mind.
Simplified_Chinese: 如果在这里放弃的话不绝得很可惜吗?不要后悔自己所选择的路~

English: Thank you for delivering the Twinkle Stones, Vagrant. Wingyei has told me a lot about you. Now, let me tell you a little something about Magician weaponry.
Simplified_Chinese: 初心者，谢谢你带来的发光石。艾文已经向我详细的介绍了你。现在让我来告诉你一些关于魔导士武器的事情吧。

English: Magicians can use both wands and staves. A wand allows the magician to attack from a distance with a charged up attack that deals additional damage while a staff can be used as a melee weapon.
Simplified_Chinese: 法杖主要使用魔法攻击，连基本攻击都要使用魔法~帅吧?权杖可以进行近距离攻击

English: You will find that Magicians primarily rely on magic spells to deal damage. However, it is important to know how these weapons work.
Simplified_Chinese: 但是，打击力比较弱，如果有效的使用这2种武器的话，一定可以成为一个很棒的魔导士喔~嘻嘻嘻。

English: I am waiting for someone to deliver some materials I require for Magician weaponry.
Simplified_Chinese: 啊?你说韦依叫你来的喔?那他应该有交代你一些事情才对啊!难道忘记了吗?所以啊…

English: Gather 10 Twinkle Stones from Aibatts near Flarine, 5 Chupims from Pukepukes and 1 Slain from Lawolf then speak with Magician Master Hee in Northern Flarine.
Simplified_Chinese: 材料是10个独眼蝠的发光石10个，5个邪精灵的坚果和1个山地野狼的狼趾甲。收集到这个材料后，去找魔导士大师海恩。

English: Magician Skills
Simplified_Chinese: 魔导士的技术

English: That concludes your lesson on Magician weaponry. Now, I'll need you to visit one of the High-Dwarpets to continue your training.
Simplified_Chinese: 我要告诉你的事情，已经讲完了。下一个考验是，你要学习关于魔导士的技术。你要去海倚矮人族的居住地。

English: Travel to Flarine and head north. You'll find a High-Dwarpet camp just south of the middle of Leren Mountains.
Simplified_Chinese: 在帕里镇一直往北的地方，有一个乐雅山脉。在乐雅山脉中部以南的地方，你可以找到高阶矮人族们的营地

English: Speak with High-Dwarpet Hastan once you arrive. If you get lost, you can check your map (M Key) to find your way.
Simplified_Chinese: 到高阶矮人族的居住地找海珊之前，请到亡者之泉找一个技能序章，这样他才会见你。

English: Do not be frightened by what lies ahead. This is your destiny. Speak with me again if you'd like to continue your path.
Simplified_Chinese: 很在意伟依对你说的话吗?他本来就这样啦~所以不要太在意，用你自己的信念去做就好啦~

English: Greetings, young one! The will of Rhisis be with you! I am Hastan. Magician Master Hee mentioned that you might be stopping by.
Simplified_Chinese: 你好，年轻人！莱斯神的意志伴随着你！我叫海珊。魔法大师海恩提到你可能会过来。

English: Magicians are powerful fighters that utilize magic to defeat their enemies. Let me go over one of the basic attacks with you.
Simplified_Chinese: 黎席斯的意志力，助你使其他人的精神混乱，请助赐给我力量吧!这是魔导士的一个技能，叫做念力球。

English: Mental Strike is a very strong magic attack that consumes Magic Points (MP) in order to be cast. This skill allows you to attack the target from a distance for a high amount of damage.
Simplified_Chinese: 这个不管对方的属性，会让对方绝得自己受了重伤，是一个很炫的技术呢~

English: Excuse me? Who are you exactly? I'm waiting for someone else right now. Take a hike!
Simplified_Chinese: 打扰了你到底是谁啊？我现在在等别人。哪儿凉快哪儿呆着去！

English: Speak with High-Dwarpet Hastan north of Flarine. Check your map (M Key) if you lose your way.
Simplified_Chinese: 到高阶矮人族的居住地找海珊之前，请到亡者之泉找一个技能序章，这样他才会见你。

English: Duty of Magician
Simplified_Chinese: 魔导士的任务

English: You learn quickly, Vagrant! Perhaps you will be a great Magician one day! Here, take this. It is a Label of Technique that details what I've explained to you today.
Simplified_Chinese: 大概懂了吧?我给你的技能的小纸条绝对不可以弄丢，也不可以丢在地上啊!那是很重要的东西，不然我绝对部会负责啦!

English: For your final task, I want you to travel to the west of Flaris and defeat the creature known as Seido. He has been harassing some of the residents of Flarine as of late.
Simplified_Chinese: For your final task, I want you to travel to the west of Flaris and defeat the creature known as Seido. He has been harassing some of the residents of Flarine as of late.

English: Once Seido is defeated, speak with Magician Instructor Lopaze in Eastern Flarine. She will conclude your training.
Simplified_Chinese: Once Seido is defeated, speak with Magician Instructor Lopaze in Eastern Flarine. She will conclude your training.

English: You've done very well so far, young one. Keep up the great work!
Simplified_Chinese: 祝你一路顺风啊~

English: You've come a long way just to give up when you're so close to the end. Speak with me again if you change your mind.
Simplified_Chinese: 是吗?看你要不要继续做下去啦~反正对我来说无所谓啊!嘻嘻嘻。

English: As Magicians, we are most effective when attacking at long range. Many of our skills employ the power of the elements.
Simplified_Chinese: 魔导士主要使用远距离攻击，因为魔导士的体力很弱，所以必须进行远距离攻击，而且魔导士也可以进行大范围的范围性攻击。

English: This allows us to take advantage of elemental vulnerabilities that our enemies may have. Congratulations, young one! You are now a Magician!
Simplified_Chinese: 而且，在混合战斗中，可以使出良好的威力。恭喜你成为魔导士!魔导士加油!

English: I sure wish someone would take care of that Seido creature near Flarine… Oh, hello! Did you need something?
Simplified_Chinese: 我真希望有人能教训一下帕里的那只小依蛾啊…哦，你好！你需要什么吗？

English: Defeat Seido near the west of Flarine. Speak with Magician Instructor Lopaze once he has been defeated.
Simplified_Chinese: Defeat Seido near the west of Flarine. Speak with Magician Instructor Lopaze once he has been defeated.

English: Find Red Bang Thieves
Simplified_Chinese: 追杀红色魔导战甲强盗团

English: Help! Help me! My cash box... My money... It's all gone! Someone stole my cash box! Iblis watch over me!
Simplified_Chinese: Help! Help me! My cash box... My money... It's all gone! Someone stole my cash box! Iblis watch over me!

English: I was saving money in my cash box in order to buy a present for my girlfriend, but it disappeared this morning.
Simplified_Chinese: 其实那金库里面的钱是，为了买礼物送给女朋友存下来的，可是今天早上看的时候，既然不见了..

English: So I have asked people, and they said that there are unknown thieves just west of the Fountain of Dead Person these days. I'm not sure I believe them though…
Simplified_Chinese: 后来我打听了一下，听说在乐雅山脉西边出现了一个不明的强盗团，我怀疑是不是他们做的!

English: Can you investigate and let me know?
Simplified_Chinese: 在我亲自用我的眼睛确认之前，我真的没办法相信有那种强盗团，可以帮我调查一下吗?

English: Thank you! Please bring me the evidence which proves they really exist. If you find them, that is.
Simplified_Chinese: 谢谢你~如果看到他们的话，请拿一点证据来，让我知道真的有强盗团的存在!

English: You only care about yourself. Fine, I'll find someone else.
Simplified_Chinese: 果然因为是别人自己的事情，所以不想帮忙啊…好吧!我去找其他人来帮我好了!

English: So they really do exist!
Simplified_Chinese: 嗯?果然有强盗团啊!真的谢谢你啊!

English: I think this is good evidence, but... I want something more conclusive!
Simplified_Chinese: 嗯..虽然这是一个不错的证据，但是我需要更详细一点的证据。

English: Find the thieves west of the Fountain of Dead Person in Flaris and return with evidence.
Simplified_Chinese: 找到居住在乐雅山脉西部的强盗团，并且拿证据回来!

English: Find Luda's Cash Box
Simplified_Chinese: 寻找路达的金库

English: I asked the witnesses with the evidence you have brought to me, and now it is clear they had stolen my cash box. Now the only thing I have to do is get the cash box back from them.
Simplified_Chinese: 嗯..我拿了你给我的证据去问村民，他们说就是它们没有错!只要把我的金库拿来就好了..

English: I am really sorry but please do me a favor once again? I really need to get that cash box back. I really need to get my girlfriend a present. You see…
Simplified_Chinese: 那个..我知道这样很不好意思..可以再帮我一次吗?我要有金库里面的钱，才能购买礼物送给女朋友…

English: it is our 100th day anniversary… She will be so upset if I don't. Would you please get my cash box back from them? I will reward you.
Simplified_Chinese: 过不几天是我跟女朋友的100天纪念日，可以帮我拿回我的钱吗?我一定会报答你的!

English: Thank you. Thank you very much. As I heard, one of them is keeping the cash box.
Simplified_Chinese: 真的很感谢你~听说我的金库，被它们的其中一个人员保管着。

English: You make me really disappointed. Whatever…
Simplified_Chinese: 呜呜..你让我太失望了..那也没办法了..我也不能强迫你..

English: You found it! Thank you so much! I'll never forget this! Take this, it's the least I can do.
Simplified_Chinese: 呜呜..真的很感谢你，这是一点心意，请你收下吧!

English: Where is my cash box? You have not found it yet. Please bring it to me. I will be waiting.
Simplified_Chinese: 金库呢?原来还没找到啊..我想你一定可以找得到的~加油!

English: Recover Luda's cash box from the Red bang Thieves at the camp west of the Fountain of Dead Person.
Simplified_Chinese: 听说它们的其中一个人员保管着我的金库，你一定可以找得到的!

English: Plot of Colack
Simplified_Chinese: 华乐的阴谋

English: Did you know that a huge meteorite fell nearby a few days ago?
Simplified_Chinese: 你知道前几天有一颗巨大的陨石落在附近吗？

English: We usually refine chunks of meteorite into a very rare metal. We call it Meteoritill.
Simplified_Chinese: 听说掉下来的岩石中有一小块，可以制作成很棒的宝石，叫做陨石。

English: It is the best material for making expensive arms or armor in Madrigal.
Simplified_Chinese: 那是一个很有名的材料呢~那个价钱也相当高喔~好像是拿来制作防具的吧!

English: It usually takes about 500 years to get it because meteorites don't fall every day. However, one just fell, so now's our chance!
Simplified_Chinese: 听说用那个宝石作武器或防具需要花500年的时间呢~可是这次好像不一样耶..听说这次掉的是很大很大的宝石。

English: Think you can find me some Meteoritill? I would be very pleased to acquire some.
Simplified_Chinese: 你能帮我找到陨石吗？我很乐意购买一些。

English: Keep it secret, though. I don't want the other armorsmiths to find out! Try searching south of Saint City.
Simplified_Chinese: 哈哈哈..帮我找5个岩石回来好吗?它好像掉在晨光南部呢~

English: Pfft! Fine! I'll find someone else to help me, but you better keep your mouth shut!
Simplified_Chinese: 哼..虽然不知道你是多么的利害啦!不想帮我就算了，也没必要那么骄傲吧!

English: Oh my… you found it! Real Meteoritill! I'll be rich beyond my wildest dreams! Muahahah!
Simplified_Chinese: Oh my… you found it! Real Meteoritill! I'll be rich beyond my wildest dreams! Muahahah!

English: Oh, I mean uh… I will be sure to make good use of this material. Here's a little something for your trouble.
Simplified_Chinese: 我是说，我一定会好好利用这些材料的。

English: Thanks again, friend!
Simplified_Chinese: 反正找这个应该很累吧!真的很感谢你啊..

English: You didn't find any? That's a shame. Keep looking! Don't give up!
Simplified_Chinese: 你没找到吗？真可惜。继续找！不要放弃！

English: Find 5 Pieces of Meteoritill and bring them to Colack in Saint City.
Simplified_Chinese: 帮我找5个岩石回来好吗?它好像掉在晨光南部呢~

English: Missing Play Script
Simplified_Chinese: 消失的剧本

English: Oh boy... I am in big trouble. How long have you been standing there? Did you hear everything I was saying?
Simplified_Chinese: 啊..糟糕了..你什么时候来的啊?应该没有听到我说的话吧?

English: You heard? Hmm... Okay, I will tell you what happened. I am in charge of play scripts for the Pepoview Troupe.
Simplified_Chinese: You heard? Hmm... Okay, I will tell you what happened. I am in charge of play scripts for the Pepoview Troupe.

English: The new play script called The Sky of Madrigal has disappeared. If I don't get it back, I'll be fired.
Simplified_Chinese: 瑞加大陆的天空既然不见了。如果被团长知道了，我一定会被开除的。

English: I know who stole it. His name is Colar, and I think he did it as payback for being fired himself.
Simplified_Chinese: 我知道是谁偷的了，那个人叫凯乐拉，而且我认为他是为了报复自己被解雇才这么做的。

English: Would you please do me a favor? Would you please bring me the play script from Colar?
Simplified_Chinese: 其他人都会发现剧本不见的事情，可以帮我去找凯乐拉之后，帮我把剧本拿回来吗?

English: You will?! Thank you very much! Colar is hiding somewhere in the far east of Darkon 1. Please find him!
Simplified_Chinese: 啊，真的谢谢你!凯乐拉现在好像在达肯1附近。拜托你~一定要帮我找回来喔~

English: I knew you weren't going to help me. Why did I even tell you all of that?
Simplified_Chinese: 我现在该怎么办呢?我一定会被开除的..

English: What?! What play script? I don't have it, I swear!
Simplified_Chinese: 什么？什么剧本？我没有，我发誓！

English: Well, yes. I stole it. A grave robber who was riding some kind of strange machine took it from me.
Simplified_Chinese: 对对对！是我！我偷走了！但是我在逃亡到这里的时候，被一个强盗抢走了!

English: The machine was spouting steam and the grave robber was riding and controlling it. That is why I am in this terrible situation now.
Simplified_Chinese: 是一个能发出蒸气的机器，强盗就骑在它身上驾驶着它！这就是为什么我现在处于这种可怕的境地！

English: All I know is that he is somewhere in the far east of Darkon 1. Please find him.
Simplified_Chinese: 我知道他在达肯1，其他的我就不知道了，麻烦你去找一下吧!

English: Colar is hiding somewhere in Darkon 1. Find him and retrieve the play script.
Simplified_Chinese: 凯乐拉现在好像在达肯1附近，找到他之后，要回剧本。

English: Looking for the Play Script
Simplified_Chinese: 寻找剧本

English: Hey! I am not lying! Why on earth do you not believe me? Okay, yes, I stole the play script, but it was for revenge!
Simplified_Chinese: 我说的是真的啦!虽然当初我偷了剧本，但是那时候只是想报仇，没有别的意思啦!

English: There is no evidence that I'm a liar, right? In that case, if you want to find the play script...
Simplified_Chinese: 没有证据能证明我是个骗子对吧？那么的话，如果你想找到剧本…..

English: I think someone among them has it.
Simplified_Chinese: 我猜他们其中一个拿着吧！

English: Hey! You there! Let me out of here! Help me, please!
Simplified_Chinese: 喂!救救我啦!嗯?

English: Look, I know it's none of your business. Will you help me anyway? Please!?
Simplified_Chinese: 没必要去管其他人的事啦!不是吗?好啦!你先来救救我啦!

English: Oh thank goodness! Finally I got it back! Thank you so very much!
Simplified_Chinese: 真的..感谢你..感谢你..终于找回来了，在晚一步我话，我就..呜呜

English: If you would have been 5 minutes longer, I would have been fired. Whew! That was a close one!
Simplified_Chinese: 再晚一步的话，我就要被团长开除了，呜呜..

English: I have a gift for you for helping me out. Please, take it.
Simplified_Chinese: 这是一点小小的心意，请收下吧~真的很感谢你喔~

English: Please find it quickly. If you don't return in time, I'll be fired! I've got 5 kids to feed!
Simplified_Chinese: 请你快点帮我找回来好吗?团长好像猜到了..拜托..

English: Look around for the machine spouting steam that is being controlled by a grave robber. You may have to use force…
Simplified_Chinese: 在周围四处找一下，找一个驾驶着巨大蒸汽机器的强盗，杀了他并且拿回剧本。当然，你可能得使用一下暴力…

English: Helper Text Book
Simplified_Chinese: 解说员的教本

English: What am I going to do? Oh my... What? You're curious as to why I'm so nervous? Actually, we Helpers have a test once every year and I'm no good under pressure.
Simplified_Chinese: 我该怎么办？我天….什么？你好奇我为什么这么紧张？实际上我们帮手每年都要有一次测试，在这种压力下我真的高兴不起来。

English: The test is very soon, and the date was just moved up all of the sudden! I am so worried! I'm a good helper, so I should pass and all, but I want to be the best!
Simplified_Chinese: The test is very soon, and the date was just moved up all of the sudden! I am so worried! I'm a good helper, so I should pass and all, but I want to be the best!

English: I have never taken first place because of that know-it-all Herth, and I absolutely must beat her this year! I will do anything to come in first place and I need your help!
Simplified_Chinese: 可是每年都会把第一的位子让给了赫丝，可是今年我很想拿到第一名。拿到第一名的办法只有一个，可是需要其他人的帮忙。

English: So will you help me, stranger?
Simplified_Chinese: 你可以帮我吗?

English: I need lessons 1 and 2 of the Helper Text Books. I understand that both lessons can be found in the flower bed behind the Public Office. Will you bring it to me?
Simplified_Chinese: 我需要解说员教本的第一章和第二章。它们可以在城镇服务处后面的花坛里找到。你可以帮我带过来吗？

English: You know, people nowadays are only worried about themselves. Typical…
Simplified_Chinese: 是喔?那就没办法了，我只好找其他人来帮我，谢谢你陪我聊了这么多。

English: Hmmm yes! These are the ones! So this must be the range of possible questions, huh?
Simplified_Chinese: 啊，对!就是这个教本第2章，这次的考题会从这边出来。你说什么?考试也有范围喔?

English: Yes, it all makes sense now! This is the information I needed. This will really help me put Herth in her place!
Simplified_Chinese: 当然~考试当然有考试范围啦~哪有考试没有范围的啊?

English: Thank you very much, my friend! Please see me anytime if you need my help.
Simplified_Chinese: 反正谢谢你啦~有需要我帮忙的话，随时都可以来找我喔~

English: Do you have the Helper Text Books I need? Please hurry, the test is very soon. I'm so nervous!
Simplified_Chinese: 啊，谢谢你帮我找教本，但是我需要的教本不是这个，可以重新帮我找吗?谢谢喔~

English: The Helper Text Books can be found in the flower bed behind Public Office of Flarine.
Simplified_Chinese: 城镇服务处后边的花坛里有解说员教本，可以把那个教本拿给我吗?很简单吧?

English: Find the Portrait of Radion
Simplified_Chinese: 寻找拉迪温的自画像

English: Hey! You there! I don't know what to do. My drawing... My best drawing has disappeared!
Simplified_Chinese: 啊..我的天啊..我的自画像怎么不见了!!

English: My hobby is collecting rare and expensive artwork. This morning I redecorating my house and I realized my most prized drawing was gone!
Simplified_Chinese: 我是专门搜集稀有物品的人，可是我这次买来的自画像既然不见了!

English: It is the portrait of the wise man, Radion. There are a number of suspects and I have no idea where to begin. What should I do?
Simplified_Chinese: 就是贤者拉迪温的自画像，虽然有很多让我感到怀疑的人，可是太多了不知道，到底是谁偷走的啊…

English: Wait a minute… I have an idea. Will you do me a favor?
Simplified_Chinese: 怎么办..啊..对了!就是这个!你可以帮我吗?

English: You will?! Thank you! I need you to speak with Helgar in Saint City. He is a connoisseur of rare and precious items. Perhaps he knows something.
Simplified_Chinese: 好!那你先去晨光找一个叫做海格乐的鉴定师，他一定有办法帮我解决的。

English: No, please! You must help me! I don't know what else to do!
Simplified_Chinese: 别！拜托！你一定要帮我！我现在已经不知道还能做些什么了！

English: What? The portrait disappeared? Hmm... I knew this was going to happen.
Simplified_Chinese: 什么?你说画不见了..我就知道是萝特泰斯做的..可是为什么对象是一幅画呢..

English: Rudvihil has a taste for rare and expensive things. He's also very greedy, and lacks values.
Simplified_Chinese: 萝特泰斯本来就是一个很贱的人，只要是他喜欢的，不管是用什么样的手段，一定都会得到。

English: If he truly has lost it, I'll do what I can to help.
Simplified_Chinese: 说不定这样也好!那个人一定要尝试一下苦头才可以!

English: Do you have something that needs my appraisal? Let me see.
Simplified_Chinese: 喔~你有什么特别的物品吗?我来看看值多少钱好了!

English: Visit Helgar, the connoisseur of rare and expensive items in the Saint City Square.
Simplified_Chinese: 去晨光找一个叫做海格乐的鉴定师，他一定有办法帮我解决的。

English: Evidence of the Portrait 1
Simplified_Chinese: 自画像的下落1

English: I don't even like speaking of Rudvihil. He is disrespectful and his actions go against everything I stand for. You need to visit the High-Dwarpets in Flaris.
Simplified_Chinese: 如果是萝特泰斯干的，那我真的不想插手。但是那个画像是绝对不可以消失的，所以我来告诉你一个方法吧!

English: Oh, you've heard of them, then? Well, they may be able to help us. I've heard they have strange powers that may help us find the missing portrait.
Simplified_Chinese: 对!应该有见过一次面，因为之前到处寻问画像的事情，后来我有听到一个可以找到画像的方法。

English: Those High-Dwarpets collect ancient books and other rare treasures. How is it they can collect these things more easily than others?
Simplified_Chinese: 这些高阶矮人族们会搜集一些古老的书籍和稀有的宝物。真不知道他们是怎么搜集的，他们找宝物可比普通人容易太多了！

English: The answer? They are clairvoyant. This allows them to see and hear things that you and I cannot comprehend. I am certain they would be able to help.
Simplified_Chinese: 后来我才想到，他们有一个千里眼，可以看到一些稀有的物品，

English: Will you meet with them?
Simplified_Chinese: 你去找找他们如何?

English: Excellent. You know where they live, right? They live in the middle of the Leren Mountains in Flaris.
Simplified_Chinese: 你应该知道他们在哪里吧?我在告诉你一下好了~他们居住在乐雅山脉中部地区，去那边见见他们吧!

English: If you don't wish to help recover what is arguably one of the most valuable pieces of art in Madrigal, then that is your business. It's a shame.
Simplified_Chinese: 不想做的话也没关系啦~萝特泰斯的表情应该够看了吧!

English: A missing portrait you say? Of Radion? Yes, I have heard of it. I will do what I can to help. Please allow me to focus my thoughts for a moment. Hmmmm….
Simplified_Chinese: 嗯..是吗?如果是别的画像我就不插手了，既然是贤者的画像，我就不得不插手了，等我一下喔~

English: I think I've found it. Yes, this has to be the one. Here, let me draw you a picture…
Simplified_Chinese: 啊!对了!来把这个收下。

English: I drew the face of the thieves who stole the portrait. This is all I can do for you.
Simplified_Chinese: 我把偷走画像的人特色写在上面了。

English: Now please go away. I can only stand humans for so long…
Simplified_Chinese: 我不喜欢人类，所以快点离我远一点!滚开啦!

English: The High-Dwarpets live in the middle of the Leren Mountains in Flaris. Please go there and meet with them.
Simplified_Chinese: 帕里的乐雅山脉中部地区，居住着高阶矮人族，去见他们吧!

English: Evidence of the Portrait 2
Simplified_Chinese: 自画像的下落2

English: We're going to need more information if we are to find the missing portrait. Wait, maybe Ancimys can help.
Simplified_Chinese: 如果我们要找到丢失的画像的话，我们需要更多的信息。等等，也许安瑟麦斯能帮上忙。

English: Powerful black magicians once existed in Madrigal. They used black magic which is slightly different than what our modern day Magicians use.
Simplified_Chinese: 听说以前有一个叫做黑暗魔导士的人，他会使用黑暗的力量使魔法。虽然现在已经不存在了，

English: One of them made a box possessing great magical power… Ancimys. Some say that very same magician locked himself inside the box, hahaha!
Simplified_Chinese: 他们其中的一位制作了一个拥有巨大魔力的魔盒叫做… 安瑟麦斯。也有人说是某个魔法师把他自己锁盒子里了，哈哈哈！

English: He may be able to use Psychmetria... What? You don't know what Psychmetria is?
Simplified_Chinese: 他或许可以使用精神魔法...什么？你不知道精神魔法是什么？

English: Psychmetria is a powerful black magic spell that can pinpoint the location of an object. You must go and find Ancimys.
Simplified_Chinese: 精神魔法是一个强大的可以精准确定物体位置黑魔法咒语。你必须去找安瑟麦斯。

English: The Ancimys you need to speak with is just south of here.
Simplified_Chinese: 你只需要和这南边的那个魔盒对话哦。

English: What do I care if you don't do it? It's no skin off my back…
Simplified_Chinese: 你想不想做，对我来说没有关系啦!反正选择的人是你啊!

English: A missing portrait? Well, isn't that exciting! I was so bored I thought I was going to fall asleep! Tell me more about this portrait.
Simplified_Chinese: 什么?既然有这种事啊?应该很好玩喔~好吧!我来帮你看看画像在哪里!等等喔!

English: Alright, give me a moment… Mmmmmm, yes. I've got it! I see a camp… and large creatures with hammers and blades for hands.
Simplified_Chinese: 好吧，给我点时间...嗯....对了 我知道了！我看到了一个营地...还有手里拿着锤子和刀片的巨大生物。

English: Ah ha! It's the Red Bang Troupe camp northeast of the Mars Mine. One of those big beasts has it! It's difficult to get to, but I'm sure you'll manage!
Simplified_Chinese: 啊哈！是魔域密殿北部的红色魔导战甲强盗团。那些大怪兽中的一个拥有它! 它很难被打败，但我相信你会成功的!

English: Are you going to play with me? Really? Good! What will we do? Hide and Seek? YAY!
Simplified_Chinese: 要跟我玩吗?要玩什么呢??

English: Find Ancimys south of the High-Dwarpet camp and ask him to find the portrait for you.
Simplified_Chinese: 去找南边高阶矮人族那儿的安瑟麦斯，然后请它帮你找丢失的画像。

English: Get the Portrait Back
Simplified_Chinese: 找回自画像

English: Be careful, I hear those Red Bang Troupe members pack quite a punch. I never liked them anyway. They don't tell good jokes.
Simplified_Chinese: 要小心，我听说那些红色魔导战甲强盗团的成员有相当大的破坏力。反正我从来都不喜欢他们，他们不是善茬。

English: I grow tired of those who are all work and no play. Kind of like you. Do you ever just have fun? Or is everything always work, work, work?
Simplified_Chinese: 我厌倦了那些只工作不玩耍的人。有点像你。 你曾经开心过吗？ 还是一切都是工作，工作，工作？

English: Ugh… well unless you have something funny to say, I think our business is concluded. I need to rest now. Black Magic takes a lot out of me.
Simplified_Chinese: 呃...除非你有好笑的事情要说，我想我们的交易已经结束了。我现在需要休息，黑魔法让我精疲力尽。

English: What do you mean? I'm not in a bad mood. I'm like this to everyone. Unless you can make me laugh!
Simplified_Chinese: 你什么意思？我没有心情不好。我对每个人都是这样的。除非你能逗我笑起来！

English: Is that my portrait?! Give it here!
Simplified_Chinese: 那是我的画像吗？！快拿过来！

English: Wait, what? What reward? I never said anything about a reward. Begone, pest!
Simplified_Chinese: 等等，什么？酬劳？我从没有说过任何关于奖励的事情。滚开，害人精！

English: Let this be a lesson to you. Before helping someone, make sure you find out upfront whether or not there is a reward being offered. Hahaha!
Simplified_Chinese: 让这成为你的教训吧。在帮助别人之前，一定要提前查清楚出是否有奖励提供。哈哈哈！

English: You haven't found it yet? Well keep looking!
Simplified_Chinese: 你还没找到吗?那继续寻找吧！

English: Travel to the Red Bang Troup camp northeast of the Mars Mine and recover the Portrait of Radion. Return it to Rudvihil once you find it.
Simplified_Chinese: 这2个线索是有关连性的，到这个地方就可以找得到了!

English: Bone of Wagsaac
Simplified_Chinese: 食人花的骨头

English: Psssst! Hey... You there! Over here! Sorry for whispering, but this is a secret from the Lab of Madrigal.
Simplified_Chinese: 这是一个很隐密的事情啦~所以要很小声..现在瑞加大陆铼瀑里喔..

English: In the Lab of Madrigal, a secret project is underway. This is actually a disguise I'm wearing, hahaha! This secret project has to do with cloning monsters!
Simplified_Chinese: 正在进行很隐密的研究，那个研究就是复制魔域怪物..

English: Why are we cloning them? Because we can, obviously! What kind of question is that? Muahahaha! Okay, listen. I need something for our cloning study.
Simplified_Chinese: Why are we cloning them? Because we can, obviously! What kind of question is that? Muahahaha! Okay, listen. I need something for our cloning study.

English: You think you might be able to help me out?
Simplified_Chinese: 你觉得你能够帮我吗？

English: Perrrrfect! In the interest of furthering our studies on Wagsaac DNA, I need some of their bones. Bring me 10 Wagsaac Bones.
Simplified_Chinese: 好!我想第一个现尝试复制食人花，所以帮我找10个食人花的骨头碎片好吗?

English: You don't want to do it, eh? Fine, I'll find someone else.
Simplified_Chinese: 如果不想帮我就算了!我还可以找其他人帮我!

English: Hmmm *Sniff* *Sniff*... Yep! This is prime grade-A Wagsaac Bone right here. Good job, sport!
Simplified_Chinese: 嘻嘻，真的是他们的骨头耶~希望下次再见喔~

English: We've got all the time in the world. Take your time. We're busy developing a mix between a Mushpang and an Aibatt. We're calling them Mushbatts!
Simplified_Chinese: 我们有大把时光，慢慢来。我们正忙着独眼蝠和嘭嘭菇的混合，我们称之为嘭嘭蝠！

English: Gather 10 Wagsaac Bones from Wagsaacs south of the Saint Tree in Saint City.
Simplified_Chinese: 第一个研究是要复制食人花，所以要去找10个食人花的骨头碎片。

English: Gene of Wagsaac
Simplified_Chinese: 食人花遗传因子

English: What, you thought that was it? Oh no, I have plenty more for you to do, champ!
Simplified_Chinese: 哈哈，我门又见面了!首先，上次你帮我找的东西，在研究上给我了很大的帮助。

English: We require more data to complete our research. Feel like helping out again?
Simplified_Chinese: 可是啊~再研究上还是缺了一点东西..可以再帮我找一样东西吗?

English: Great! We need 10 Gene Pieces from Wagsaacs this time. We're close to cloning out first Wagsaac! Get going!
Simplified_Chinese: 我就知道你一定会帮我的，这次我需要的是10个食人花遗传因子碎片。

English: Don't want to do it, eh? You kill hundreds of small animals and you're going to preach to me about ethics?
Simplified_Chinese: 你的那种态度还真让人讨厌啊!你不是已经动过手了吗?

English: Ohhh yeah! This is good stuff! Thanks again!
Simplified_Chinese: 嘻嘻，真的很感谢你耶~希望下次再见喔~

English: Take your time, friend. We're busy making Jack in the Giggle Boxes out of Jack the Hammers and Giggle Boxes!
Simplified_Chinese: 我之前也跟你说过了，数量一定要对!

English: Gather 10 pieces of Wagsaac DNA for Heitung in Saint City.
Simplified_Chinese: 需要10个食人花遗传因子碎片。

English: Origin of Bone Bowl
Simplified_Chinese: 骨制御碗的由来

English: *Gnarllll!* Hey! You there! You don't know me, right? My reputation usually precedes me. I am the strange collector!
Simplified_Chinese: 喂!呵呵呵，你应该第一次见到我吧?你有听过诡异的搜藏家吗?

English: I wanted to ask you something. Have you ever heard of the Bone Bowl? No, not just some random Bone Bowl. THE Bone Bowl!
Simplified_Chinese: 其实，那个诡异的搜藏家就是我啦~我有一件事情想拜托你，所以才找你过来的，你应该有听过骨制御碗吧?

English: I'm talking about the original cursed Bone Bowl.
Simplified_Chinese: 嗯?你说我找那个做什么啊?我想找的是第一个做出来的骨制御碗，也就是有下诅咒的那个。

English: I am looking to acquire it. Will you help me?
Simplified_Chinese: 如何?有兴趣吗?要不要帮我呢?

English: *Grawrrrll* Great! Head to the Garden of Rhisis and find (Bowl Merchant) Bowler! *SNARF!*
Simplified_Chinese: 好，你到莱斯庭院去的话，可以找到一个叫做保罗克的商人，你去问他就可以了!

English: Oh come on! I can pay you as much as you want! *GNARL*
Simplified_Chinese: 我一定会给你酬劳的，你一定要帮我啦~除了你没有人可以帮我了!再考虑一下啦~

English: Hmmm… so the strange collector wants the Bone Bowl, huh?
Simplified_Chinese: 嗯..诡异的搜藏家终于露面了，看起来他好像真的很想要那个骨制御碗..

English: Hahaha! I knew this day would come.
Simplified_Chinese: 哈哈哈!我就知道这一天迟早会来。

English: Hello there! Are you looking for something special?
Simplified_Chinese: 来到着么远的地方~想要买什么特别的吗?

English: Locate Bowler, the Bowl Merchant in the Garden of Rhisis.
Simplified_Chinese: 莱斯庭院去的话，可以找到一个叫做保罗克的商人，你去问他就可以了!

English: The 1st Bone Bowl
Simplified_Chinese: 最初的骨制御碗

English: The Bone Bowl was created by a black magician a long long time ago. In a town, a woman lived with her little pet, who was named Baby.
Simplified_Chinese: 骨制御碗这个东西是，在很久以前，有一个黑暗没法师所做出来的。据说在很久以前，人民与魔域怪物都住在一起，但是..

English: The pet went crazy and began attacking townsfolk. As a result, both of them were kicked out of the town.
Simplified_Chinese: 有一个女子爱上了一个魔域怪，后来这个女子怀了魔域怪的孩子，之后被赶出村外。没多久魔域怪死亡之后，

English: The woman came back to the town, but the people in town killed her pet! Then the black magician made a bowl out of the skull of her pet and cursed it!
Simplified_Chinese: 女子抱着孩子回到村子，但是村民把女子跟孩子全都杀掉了。黑暗魔导士就利用孩子的头骨，做了一个情盆，而在这个情盆里下了诅咒。

English: The town disappeared because of the curse, and so did the bowl…but there are some that say…Well, I've already said too much.
Simplified_Chinese: 之后村子因为情盆的诅咒而消失了，得到这个情盆的人民也没有一个生存下来。

English: So you want the real Bone Bowl, right? Well, you'll have to do something for me first. Nothing in this world is free, right? Hahaha!
Simplified_Chinese: 你说想要真的骨制御碗吗?那帮我找一些东西好吗?

English: Good! Bring me 10 Black Tombmarbles from Tombstone Bearers, 5 Black Spell Books and 5 Black Heroka Grass from somewhere in the Garden of Rhisis.
Simplified_Chinese: 好，请帮我找碑石工匠的10个黑色石柱碎片，在莱斯庭院里就可以找到的黑色诅咒书5个，黑色毒草5个。

English: Hey, it's up to you. Too bad though, I could have used those items to help you with your problem…
Simplified_Chinese: 他应该会很难过吧!我猜应该还有其他喜欢钱的玩家会帮他吧!

English: Great job! This stuff will come in real handy!
Simplified_Chinese: 找对了~真正确!好，我要开始做了!

English: You did not bring me everything I asked. Please bring me the items I requested.
Simplified_Chinese: 还不够呢~请依照数量找给我~

English: Bring 10 Black Tombmarbles from Tombstone Bearers, 5 Black Spell Books and 5 black Heroka grass to Bowler the Bowl Merchant in Rhisis.
Simplified_Chinese: 找碑石工匠的10个黑色石柱碎片，在莱斯庭院里就可以找到的黑色诅咒书5个，黑色毒草5个。

English: Facts of Bone Bowl
Simplified_Chinese: 骨制御碗的事实

English: To be honest, it disappeared a long time ago. It corroded because it was made of bone.
Simplified_Chinese: 说实话，真正的情盆已经不存在了，毕竟它是用骨头做的，所以早已经腐烂了。

English: That is why I asked you to bring me these materials. These are the materials that the black magician used to place the curse on the Bone Bowl in the first place.
Simplified_Chinese: 所以我才请你找这些东西给我的，当时黑暗魔导士，就是使用这些东西给骨制御碗下诅咒的。

English: I do not have the power to curse it as strongly as the black magician did. I can certainly curse it as much as any collector could!
Simplified_Chinese: 虽然没有黑暗魔导士那么强大的诅咒，但是至少会使那个搜藏家感到有诅咒的感觉。

English: Now, please bring this Bone Bowl to the Strange Collector.
Simplified_Chinese: 你现在可以把这个骨制御碗交给诡异的搜藏家了。

English: The Strange Collector will be very happy. Just don't tell him I had to make another one. Hahaha!
Simplified_Chinese: 好，那个诡异的搜藏家应该会很开心的。

English: There's nothing to be afraid of! The curse isn't contagious! Muahaha!
Simplified_Chinese: There's nothing to be afraid of! The curse isn't contagious! Muahaha!

English: You got it?! Amazing! Look at the craftsmanship! And it's do well preserved! It's as if it was made today!
Simplified_Chinese: 啊..终于帮我找到了，真是太美丽了..谢谢你!!

English: Great job, my friend. This bowl is amazing!
Simplified_Chinese: 辛苦你了!你可以走了啦!

English: You don't have it yet? Well, what are you waiting for? Go!
Simplified_Chinese: 什么?还没找到喔?唉唷~快点帮我找一下啦~我都等不及了啦!

English: Take the Bone Bowl to the Strange Collector in Northern Saint City.
Simplified_Chinese: 好了，请把这个骨制御碗交给那个收藏家吧!他一定会很开心的!

English: Tears of Mother
Simplified_Chinese: 母亲的眼泪

English: Please help me! My daughter has been missing for so long!
Simplified_Chinese: 那个!那个!!呜呜..帮我找一下我的女儿好吗?

English: My daughter disappeared a few years ago. I have reported her missing to the Public Office and tried to find her myself, but to no avail.
Simplified_Chinese: 我的女儿失踪了好几年了…我找了好几年..但是..

English: I have done everything I can do so far, but I'm at my wits end. I'm even asking Vagrants for help now!
Simplified_Chinese: 什么方法都是过了..可是..呜呜..可是都找不到..所以我想拜托冒险家…

English: Please, will you help me find my daughter?
Simplified_Chinese: 拜托..请帮我找我的女儿好吗?拜托..呜呜..

English: Thank you. I think you can obtain some information from Porgo, who lives in nearby Saint Hall. He will definitely know something.
Simplified_Chinese: 谢谢你..真的谢谢你…晨光圣教堂附近有一个叫做柏洛格的人，他好像知道什么的样子..

English: *Faints*
Hmm... JeongHwa has not given up on finding her daughter yet. What a pity, but her daughter is not the only child who has disappeared recently.
Simplified_Chinese: 额…吉哈娃还没放弃寻找她的女儿啊。太遗憾了，不过在最近，她的女儿并不是这儿唯一丢失的孩子。

English: Lots of the girls from Saint City disappeared. I formed a citizen investigation team, but we failed to discover any clues.
Simplified_Chinese: 晨光的所有女孩，几乎全部失踪了，我虽然组了一个团体带领了一群人去找，但是连一个线索都找不到..

English: Now I am the only one left from the team, but I am still investigating the case because we'd like to bring those kids home.
Simplified_Chinese: 虽然这个组织里现在只剩下我一个人，我现在还是在调查，因为有很多疑问是很不能了解的。

English: I am the leader of the investigation team that was investigating the missing children. But now, I am the only one left...
Simplified_Chinese: 我是跳查晨光儿童失踪协会的会长，虽然现在只剩下我一个人..

English: Go to Saint Hall in Saint City, and meet with Porgo.
Simplified_Chinese: 晨光圣教堂附近有一个叫做柏洛格的人，他好像知道什么的样子..

English: Kids Disappeared?
Simplified_Chinese: 孩子们失踪了?

English: The case of the missing children? Hmm... Well a few years ago, a group of young, six year old girls suddenly disappeared from Saint City.
Simplified_Chinese: The case of the missing children? Hmm... Well a few years ago, a group of young, six year old girls suddenly disappeared from Saint City.

English: Everyone attempted to find the kids, but they all failed.
Simplified_Chinese: 当时，城镇管理所与其他机构都去查询，但是找不到任何线索，后续就处理为未解决事件。

English: I never gave up and I kept trying to solve the case. I had discovered many things, and reported them to the Public Office.
Simplified_Chinese: 可是，我发现了一些可疑的事情，后来提出给城镇管理所。

English: However, they rejected my findings due to the lack of evidence. So as I was gathering evidence, I suddenly came up with an idea when I saw those strange Masquerpets; Mia.
Simplified_Chinese: 可是，他们说证据不足，所以被退回来了，我看到怪物米娅娃娃之后才想到了一些东西..

English: Anyway, will you help me?
Simplified_Chinese: 你可以帮我吗?

English: Great! Slay 20 Small Mias and tell me what you make of them.
Simplified_Chinese: 好，你去猎杀20只粗布米娅娃娃之后，告诉我他们的特征好吗?

English: That's a shame. I guess there's no hope for those girls…
Simplified_Chinese: 因为对我来说是很困难的事情，所以才请你帮我的。如果你也不想帮我的话，也没办法啦。

English: Uh huh, yes. I see. Okay, thank you for bringing me this information, friend.
Simplified_Chinese: 嗯..是这样啊..好了!有这些的话就可以了!这样的话证据就够了，谢谢你啊。

English: I need more information, friend. Please slay 20 Small Mias and report back to me.
Simplified_Chinese: 你要去杀20只才能够知道他们的特征啦，因为我要找出详细一点的证据。
