English: Welcome to Madrigal!
Simplified_Chinese: 初心者的登场

English: Welcome, traveler! By the look of you, I'd say you're getting ready for an adventure, am I right? Well then you've come to the right place!
Simplified_Chinese: 欢迎来到飞飞世界！这里是第一次来到飞飞世界，所必经的大陆啊~！现在你要猎杀怪物，让自己慢慢变强了！

English: There are plenty of dangerous monsters out there to battle, and my shop will help you get prepared for the fight!
Simplified_Chinese: 在战斗之前，我要介绍一些NPC给你吧。

English: You'll be seeing me a lot later on, I'm sure, but for now why don't you pay our local smith Boboko a visit?
Simplified_Chinese: 杂货商店会卖在战斗中所需要的辅助武器和魔法用品，你以后会经常光顾的哦

English: Boboko owns the Armor Shop near here, and I think he might have something special for you.
Simplified_Chinese: 在了解杂货商店之后，现在就去找负责防具的NPC吧，你到防具商店波弟会很高兴的。虽然对你来说很少，不过这些零钱给你！

English: Boboko's right nearby, you can't miss him with all the hammering! Oh, and welcome to Madrigal!
Simplified_Chinese: 防具商店的波弟正望着我这边，因为距离很近，所以不会太难找！他总是很认真的在敲锤子。

English: Packing it in so soon? But the day's just started! You have so much to do!
Simplified_Chinese: 为了要让初心者可以在飞飞世界里存活下去，进行这个任务对你会有很大的帮助！

English: Howdy! Lui told me you'd be coming! Here, this should help you get started. Next time you come by, we'll get you underway on your Vagrant training.
Simplified_Chinese: 你是这次的新初心者！欢迎来到飞飞世界。虽然只有一点点，但请你收下吧。在紧急的时候，可以使用它。如果下次你再过来找我，我们就开始初心者教育。

English: Visit Boboko of the Armor Shop to receive a gift.
Simplified_Chinese: 你去防具商店找波弟，就给你100金币。

English: Introduction to Armor
Simplified_Chinese: 初心者教育(1)

English: Good to see you again! Glad to see some new faces in Madrigal, what with all the Masquerpets around. Let's see what we can do to get you ready to face them.
Simplified_Chinese: 再次欢迎你来到飞飞世界！除了我以外，在瑞加大陆大陆上的所有人们也都非常的欢迎你。现在做好要和怪物战斗的准备了吗？

English: This is the Armor Shop. Here, you can buy the armor crafted by my family once you meet the requirements for it. There are 4 armor slots in your inventory - Helmet, Suit, Gauntlet, and Boots.
Simplified_Chinese: 这里是防具商店，虽然还没有卖能够让你穿戴的防具，不过早晚可以让你穿戴的。防具有头盔、上衣、手套、鞋子共4种。

English: You'll find that different jobs and levels have access to different kinds of armor. 'Course, you probably already knew that. Now, go talk with my brother Boboku next door at his Weapon Shop.
Simplified_Chinese: 随着职业不同，也各自穿戴不同的防具，越好的防具就需要越高的等级才可以穿戴。你去找在我旁边的武器商店波哥吧。他会告诉你有关武器的说明。

English: I know it's loud over here, but didn't you see me pointin'? Boboku's Weapon Shop is right next door!
Simplified_Chinese: 武器商店波哥就在我的旁边，你没有看到吗？

English: You sure? Well if you change your mind, nobody knows weapons like my brother Boboku.
Simplified_Chinese: 对于武器，波哥是最懂的。你一定要去找他。

English: Well hello there! Good of you to stop by. Here, take this, and the next time I see ya we'll get you up to speed on weapons.
Simplified_Chinese: 你好，太高兴了！想不到你会来找我…这分礼物是我的一点心意，请你收下吧！如果下次再来找我，我会告诉你有关武器的说明。

English: Visit Boboko at the Weapon Shop.
Simplified_Chinese: 你去防具商店找波弟，就给你500金币。

English: Introduction to Weapons
Simplified_Chinese: 初心者教育(2)

English: Just like armor, weapons differ by the job. You don't have the experence to wield anything in my shop yet, but look around Madrigal, I'm sure you'll find something.
Simplified_Chinese: 武器随着职业不同，所使用的武器种类也会不同。在我所贩卖的武器中，还没有你能够使用的武器，但是你可以看看我这有哪些武器。

English: As a Vagrant, you can use a sword in one hand and a shield in the other. Equip them by double-clicking them or dragging them into the appropriate slot in your inventory.
Simplified_Chinese: 初心者的你可以使用剑或斧头，也可以装备盾牌。装备的方法只要将点两下物品栏内的武器或拖曳到装备视窗上对应的部位，就可以了。

English: Now you're ready to look at shields. Go see Luda next door at the Shield Shop and he'll take care of you.
Simplified_Chinese: 关于武器的说明，这样子就可以了。接着你要了解有关盾牌方面的事情。请你去盾牌商店找路达吧，他会特别对你说明的。

English: Luda's Shield Shop is just next door. Have fun, kid! Stop by anytime you need a good weapon!
Simplified_Chinese: 盾牌商店的路达就在我的旁边。他是个有趣的人，你一定要去见他。

English: Look, I know it's not as exciting as axes and swords, but you'll need one just the same. Plus he's got plenty of other stuff for sale, so pay him a visit.
Simplified_Chinese: 不只是盾牌而已，他也卖一些初心者专用的装备。他是你一定要知道的NPC。

English: Haha, nice to meet ya, name's Luda! I'm in charge of shields and other equipment for Vagrants here in Madrigal. Let's get you set up to fight, shall we?
Simplified_Chinese: 哈哈哈~欢迎你啊。我是负责盾牌和初心者专用装备的路达。下次找我，那时我会对你做一些教育！

English: Visit Luda at the Shield Shop.
Simplified_Chinese: 你就去盾牌商店找路达，就给你1000金币。

English: Introduction to Shields
Simplified_Chinese: 初心者教育(3)

English: Hahaha! Welcome to the Shield Shop! You can buy shields, weapons, and armor for Vagrants here. I stock all the equipment that you need prior to your first job change at level 15.
Simplified_Chinese: 哈哈哈~欢迎来到盾牌商店。这里不只盾牌，还有贩卖初心者专用武器和防具。在到达等级15第1次转职以前，来我这里可以购买你需要的装备。

English: Why don't you buy a Long Sword with the Penya you've collected? You can buy it by double tapping on it or dragging it into your inventory.
Simplified_Chinese: 即然来到这里，就用你拿到的金币和我买长剑吧。购买方法在道具目录栏上，将你想买的道具拖曳到你的物品栏里，就可以了。

English: Also, you can sell an item by dragging it into the shop window. Pretty easy, huh? Okay, after buying it, please visit Losha at the Food Shop.
Simplified_Chinese: 贩卖方法在物品栏里拖曳到道具目录栏里，就可以。非常简单吧？如果你都购买好了，就去饮食店找萝夏吧。

English: Losha at the Food Shop is staying in Eastern Flarine which is located to the east of here. You'll have to cross the bridge to get there.
Simplified_Chinese: 饮食店萝夏就在东边的帕里 ，那边会有一座桥，所以你不需要担心。

English: What, you think it's too far? The Food Shop is very important for your journey, you should definitely check it out.
Simplified_Chinese: 你觉得远吗？不过饮食店是卖饮食的重要地方，你一定要知道。

English: You are new to Madrigal, right? Hi! I have heard a lot about you already! Here, take this. It's a gift from Luda. Talk to me again for you next task!
Simplified_Chinese: 哎唷！是新来到飞飞世界的见习者吗？你好啊，请收下盾牌商店路达大人准备的礼物！如果下次再来找我，就会是最后的见习者教育了。

English: You should buy a Long Sword from Luda at the Shield Shop.
Simplified_Chinese: 你要持有长剑才可以。盾牌商店路达有在卖~！

English: Losha at the Food Shop will give me a Green Shield and 1,200 Penya when I visit her.
Simplified_Chinese: 你就去饮食店找萝夏，就给你高级木盾和1200金币。

English: A Vagrant's First Steps (1)
Simplified_Chinese: 初心者的第一步(1)

English: Hello! I am Losha and I run the Food Shop. I sell food that is helpful for when you lose your Health Points (HP). Each type of food has a different recovery power and level requirement.
Simplified_Chinese: 我在贩卖的食物是可以补充HP的。各种类都有不同的HP恢复量，如果你HP剩余较多时，每次食用的恢复量就会减少哦

English: You can eat the food by double-clicking it in your inventory. Also, you can add them to your hot keys. Please remember that once you eat food, you cannot eat again for a certain amount of time.
Simplified_Chinese: 使用食物的方法，双点击物品栏位的食物，也可以透过拖曳到热键栏后使用。要记住使用过一次后，在一定的时间之内，不能马上再使用。

English: Now that the lesson is over it is time for some combat! There are a lot of Aibatts to the north. Please hunt 15 Small Aibatts and go back to Luda at the Shield Shop.
Simplified_Chinese: 现在课程结束了，是时候进行一些战斗了！帕里北广场边有很多独眼蝠。击杀15只独眼蝠，完成后去找防具店的路达吧。

English: Don't be too nervous and please check your equipment again before you venture out. Oh, and don’t forget to buy some food!
Simplified_Chinese: Don't be too nervous and please check your equipment again before you venture out. Oh, and don’t forget to buy some food!

English: This is only your first step into a larger world. Don't hesitate, go forth and defeat those Small Aibatts!
Simplified_Chinese: 现在是你踏出初心者第一步的时候，不用再犹豫了，快点去击杀独眼蝠吧。

English: Great! You completed your task wonderfully! I can see that you will be very famous one day. If you talk to me again, I will give you another task which will be a little bit harder.
Simplified_Chinese: 太了不起啦！虽然你是第一次，不过你漂亮的完成任务了。下次我会拜托你比较难的任务。

English: You should hunt 15 Small Aibatts. Please check in the quest window (Q Key) and return to Luda at the Shield Shop once you're finished.
Simplified_Chinese: 击杀15只小独眼蝠。任务窗口（Q键）可以查看任务的进度，完成后返回防具商店路达处。

English: Luda at the Shield Shop will give me 2,500 Penya when I hunt 15 Small Aibatts and return to him.
Simplified_Chinese: 击杀15只小独眼蝠后，去找防具商的路达，他会给你2500金币。

English: A Vagrant's First Steps (2)
Simplified_Chinese: 初心者的第一步(2)

English: I didn’t know that you could accomplish so much this fast! How wonderful! I have one more request for you. There are other monsters around Flarine. They are called Mushpangs.
Simplified_Chinese: 实在是没有想到你在这么短的时间里，会有这么大的成长。太了不起啦！最后想要再拜托你一件事情。独眼蝙蝠和其它怪物一起包围我们的村子，他们叫做嘭嘭菇。

English: Please wipe them out! If you hunt 10 Small Mushpangs and 5 normal Mushpangs, I will give you a reward. Oh, and hold onto any trophies they drop, as they will be very useful in the near future!
Simplified_Chinese: 请帮我教训这些怪物吧！打倒10只小嘭嘭菇和5只嘭嘭菇后，再回来找我，我会给你奖励的。打倒怪物会掉下不错的战利品，请你要收集起来喔！

English: Yeah, I knew you could do this!
Simplified_Chinese: 我果然没有看错人啊。  为了瑞加大陆大陆的和平~~

English: Mushpangs are very easy for you to hunt! Help protect Flarine from this menace!
Simplified_Chinese: 以你现在的实力来看，嘭嘭菇应该是很简单的怪物吧。 拜托你，为了帕里的村民们，使用你的力量吧。

English: It appears there is no monster that can threaten you around Flarine. It's time for you to step out into the world and show your power! Your adventure has just started!
Simplified_Chinese: 现在帕里周围已经没有可以威胁你的怪物了，现在请你到宽广的外面世界去，让我看看你真正的实力吧。

English: You didn’t hunt 15 Small Mushpang and 15 Mushpang yet.
Simplified_Chinese: 你还没有打倒我所拜托的小嘭嘭菇15只和嘭嘭菇15只啊。请你确认清楚后，再来找我吧。

English: Luda at the Shield Shop will give me 10,000 Penya when I hunt 15 Small Mushpang and 15 Mushpang, and then return to him.
Simplified_Chinese: 打倒小嘭嘭菇15只和嘭嘭菇15只后，去盾牌商店找路达给你10000金币。

English: Flaris
Simplified_Chinese: 帕里

English: Saint Morning
Simplified_Chinese: 晨光

English: Darkon
Simplified_Chinese: 达肯

English: 1st Job Change
Simplified_Chinese: 1次转职

English: 2nd Job Change
Simplified_Chinese: 2次转职

English: Mars Dungeon
Simplified_Chinese: 魔域密殿

English: Laws of Aviation (1)
Simplified_Chinese: 飞翔之律 (1)

English: Hello traveler! It looks like you've reached level 20! You know what this means right? You can now fly on your very own flying device!
Simplified_Chinese: 你好啊，旅行者！看起来你已经达到了20级！你知道这意味着什么吗？你现在可以用你自己的飞行器进行飞行了！

English: Scared? Don't worry, go see the Station Manager Dior. She'll show you the ropes and get you flying in no time!
Simplified_Chinese: 感觉到害怕？不用担心，去见见飞行站的管理员迪奥吧。她将会向你展示飞行技巧并让你马上就能习惯飞行的！

English: Dior is on Flarine Station. Take the elevator right in front of me. You can't miss it!
Simplified_Chinese: 迪奥位于帕里镇的飞行站。乘坐你面前的电梯吧。不要错过了哦！

English: You don't have to be scared. Well... if you change your mind, do let me know! I'll be right here.
Simplified_Chinese: 你没必要感到害怕的。好吧..如果你改变了你的想法，请务必让我知道！我会一直在这的。

English: What's this? Is sent you? Oh! you want to know about flying on your own flying device? Why didn't you say so?
Simplified_Chinese: 这是什么？是它送你来的吗？噢！你想学习如何使用自己的飞行器进行飞行吗？你为什么不直接说呢？

English: Visit Dior to learn all about flying.
Simplified_Chinese: 去见迪奥以学习关于飞行的所有知识。

English: Laws of Aviation (2)
Simplified_Chinese: 飞翔之律 (2)

English: So you've finally reached level 20! This is the perfect time to learn how to operate your very own flying device.
Simplified_Chinese: 你终于到达20级了！这是学习如何操控你自己飞行器的最佳时机。

English: The first thing you need to do is buy a flying device. Come back to me when you have one. I sell Boards & Brooms so take a look in my Store.
Simplified_Chinese: 你需要做的第一件事就是购买一个飞行器。当你拥有一个飞行器的时候再回来找我吧。正好我的商店销售滑板和扫帚飞行器，你可以看看。

English: Buy a flying device of your choice, and report back to me.
Simplified_Chinese: 购买你选择的飞行器后再向我报告。

English: Let me know when you're ready.
Simplified_Chinese: 当你准备好的时候，请告知我。

English: You've made your choice? Great, let's get started!
Simplified_Chinese: 你已经做出了你的选择吗？真棒，让我们开始吧！

English: Buy a flying device and report back to Dior.
Simplified_Chinese: 购买一个飞行器后向迪奥报告。

English: Laws of Aviation (3)
Simplified_Chinese: 飞翔之律 (3)

English: Now that you have your very own flying device, I'm going to assign you a test. That's right, a test! Just for fun of course. Hehe~
Simplified_Chinese: 现在你拥有了你自己的飞行器。我将交给你一个测试。没错，一个测试！当然，这只是闹着玩的。哈哈哈~

English: I want you to fly to the North of Saint City, and meet my associate Tina. Once you've arrived, let her know I sent you. She'll know what to do from there. I've sent countless travelers before you!
Simplified_Chinese: 我希望你飞去晨光的东部，并且与我的助手蒂娜见面。当你到达时，让她知道是我派你过来的。她将会知道后面继续该怎么做。因为在你之前我已经将数不清的旅行者派送过去了。

English: Tina is at Saint City Station. That's the most northern part of Saint City. It's the biggest Station in Madrigal, I'm sure you won't miss it!
Simplified_Chinese: 蒂娜在晨光最北边的晨光飞行站。晨光飞行站是瑞加大陆最大的飞行站，我相信你会找到它的。

English: Not ready yet? That's fine. Just let me know when you're up to the task.
Simplified_Chinese: 还没准备好？好吧。当你准备好执行任务的时候请告诉我。

English: What's this? Dior sent you? Another traveler taking Diors Flying test? You're the first one in a while! Just give me a moment. I'll be with you shortly.
Simplified_Chinese: 这是什么？是迪奥派你来的吗？又一个接受了迪奥飞行测试的旅行者吗？你是这段时间第一个到达我这里的人！请等我一会，我马上就过来。

English: Fly to Saint City
Simplified_Chinese: 飞往晨光

English: Laws of Aviation (4)
Simplified_Chinese: 飞翔之律 (4)

English: Alright, sorry about that. I just had to finish some important paperwork. Now, where were we?
Simplified_Chinese: 好吧，我为此感到抱歉。我刚刚必须得完成一些重要的书面任务。回到现在，我们进行到哪了？

English: *cough* ...Oh! The test, right. Sorry! To get you more familiar with your flying device, I want you to experience Air Combat! Yes, you can also fight in the air! It's very similar to regular Combat, actually.
Simplified_Chinese: *咳嗽声*..噢！对！是测试。我很抱歉！为了让你更加熟练使用你的飞行器，我希望你能去体验一下如何在空中猎杀怪物！没错，你还能在天上战斗！实际上，它和平常的战斗没什么区别。

English: You can even use skills in the air. Give it a try! Go and kill some of those Pesky Captain Mothbees flying near the northwestern edge of Saint City.
Simplified_Chinese: 你甚至能在天上使用技能。快去试试吧！去杀死一些在晨光西北边缘的令人讨厌的巨型苍翼蜂蛾吧。

English: You'll find the Mothbees flying inbetween Flaris and Saint Morning. They seem to gather near the giant gears. Killing 5 should be enough. Report back to me once you're done.
Simplified_Chinese: 你会在帕里和晨光之间找到苍翼蜂蛾。他们似乎会在巨型齿轮周围聚集。请前去杀死5只苍翼蜂蛾，当你完成后回来向我报告。

English: They're just bugs, they're not that scary! *sigh* Let me know when you've found enough courage.
Simplified_Chinese: 它们不会尖叫的，它们只是虫子而已！*叹气*，当你拥有足够的勇气的时候再回来找我吧。

English: Wow impressive! You've really got a knack for this. Well done. You've passed the test!
Simplified_Chinese: 哇，真令人印象深刻！你现在已经掌握了飞行技巧！干得漂亮。你通过了测试！

English: Kill 5 Captain Mothbees then return back to Tina.
Simplified_Chinese: 杀死5个巨型苍翼蜂蛾后再回去找蒂娜。

English: Laws of Aviation (5)
Simplified_Chinese: 飞翔之律 (5)

English: Oh, back already? That was fast! You sure made quick work of those Mothbees.
Simplified_Chinese: 噢，这就回来了？实在是太快了吧！你肯定很快就搞定了哪些苍翼蜂蛾。

English: Here, take this letter. Please deliver it to Dior in Flarine. It's a Letter of Recommendation. Once she reads it I'm sure she'll give you a reward! Hehe~
Simplified_Chinese: 请收下这封信。请将它交给帕里镇的迪奥。这是一封推荐信，当她读了信后就会给你奖励的！嘿嘿嘿~

English: Have a safe journey back to Flaris. See you again soon! Tell my sweetie Dior I said hi!
Simplified_Chinese: 祝你去帕里时一路顺风。期待下次与你见面！麻烦你替我向我的宝贝迪奥打声招呼！

English: There's no rush. Just talk to me again when you are ready.
Simplified_Chinese: 现在也不着急。当你准备好了后就告诉我吧。

English: Welcome back traveler. What's this? A letter of recommendation? Let's see... *mumble mumble* ...wow! Passed with flying colors I see! Well done!
Simplified_Chinese: 欢迎回来，我的旅行者。这是什么？一封推荐信？我看看...*咕哝声*...哇噢！你的测试完成得如此快速！干的真棒！

English: Deliver the letter to Dior.
Simplified_Chinese: 将信交给迪奥。

English: Take to the Skies!
Simplified_Chinese: 飞向天空！

English: I knew there was something special about you. After reading this letter it seems Tina has taken a liking to you too! What does the letter say, you ask? That's a secret!
Simplified_Chinese: 我就知道你是有过人之处的。看完这封信后，我发现蒂娜也喜欢上你了！噢？你问信里写了什么？这可是秘密！

English: Congratulations on passing the Initial Test. I'll prepare a reward. It's an experimental fuel that gives your flying device a temporary speed boost!
Simplified_Chinese: 恭喜你通过初步测试。我将会为你准备好奖励。奖励是能够让你的飞行器能够加速一段时间得实验性燃料。

English: When you have time come speak to me again. I'll prepare the reward for you now.
Simplified_Chinese: 当你有空的时候再来找我。我现在该为你准备奖励了。

English: Speak to me when you get a moment. I'll prepare the reward for you.
Simplified_Chinese: 当你有空的时候再找我。我将会为你准备奖励。

English: Your reward is ready! Here you go! Come see me again once you've gained more experience. I'm sure I'll have more "Tests" for you! *wink*
Simplified_Chinese: 你的奖励已经准备好了！干得漂亮！当你获得更多经验后再来找我吧！我已经为你准备好了更多测试！*Wink*

English: Speak with Dior to claim your reward.
Simplified_Chinese: 与迪奥对话获取你的奖励。

English: Returning Mission
Simplified_Chinese: 返回任务

English: Menacing Phantom
Simplified_Chinese: 来势汹汹的幻影

English: The final task awaits. Please eliminate Serus Uriel. If we don't eliminate her now while she's weakened, Flaris will be in grave danger.
Simplified_Chinese: 最后的任务在等待。请消灭赛罗斯蛇妖。如果我们现在不趁她虚弱的时候消灭她，帕里将面临严重的危险。

English: Use the key I gave you to enter her lair. Please be careful, the monsters inside are on whole other level compared to the Guardians. It would be wise to form a party before entering her chamber.
Simplified_Chinese: 使用我给你的钥匙，进入她的巢穴。请小心，里面的怪物与守护者相比，完全是另一个层次。在进入之前，最好先组一个团队。

English: There is no time. Please rethink this through...
Simplified_Chinese: 没有时间了，请重新考虑...

English: You've returned! Flaris can be at peace once again. Thank you, adventurer. Please take this as a reward. You have my gratitude.
Simplified_Chinese: 你已经回来了! 帕里可以再次得到安宁了，谢谢你，冒险家。请把这个作为奖励，向你表示感谢。

English: The main thing is you are still alive. Take time to recover, and try again! You can do this!
Simplified_Chinese: 最主要的是你还活着。花点时间恢复，再试一次! 你可以做到这一点!

English: Defeat 3 Worm Veduques and eliminate Serus Uriel. Use the Mars Dungeon key to enter her chamber.
Simplified_Chinese: 打败3个妖女蛇，消灭赛罗斯蛇妖。使用魔域密殿的钥匙，进入她的密室。

English: Azria
Simplified_Chinese: 阿兹利亚

English: Welcome to Azria!
Simplified_Chinese: 欢迎来到阿兹利亚！

English: Welcome to Azria, one of the coldest places in Madrigal!
Simplified_Chinese: 欢迎来到阿兹利亚，瑞加大陆最寒冷的地方之一！

English: This town is a haven in this dangerous place. Masquerpets have overrun the entire continent and made much of this land uninhabitable.
Simplified_Chinese: 这个小镇是这危险地带的避风港。怪物们已经席卷了整个大陆，使这片土地的大部分地区都无法居住。

English: We see you have come a long way to get here. I bet it was a very dangerous journey! You must be very brave.
Simplified_Chinese: 你肯定走了很长一段路才到这里。我敢打赌，这是一段非常危险的旅程！你一定很勇敢。

English: Feel free to stay as long as you need to. Go and visit Gigaka, our protector. He will help you stay safe.
Simplified_Chinese: 如要留下，请随意。去找季加卡吧，我们的守护者。他会保证你的安全。

English: Welcome to Azria! (2)
Simplified_Chinese: 欢迎来到阿兹利亚！(2)

English: Azria is a dangerous place. You are lucky you made it here and lived.
Simplified_Chinese: 阿兹利亚是一个危险的地方。能活下来，算你走运。

English: I help protect this small town. Dangerous Masquerpets are everywhere.
Simplified_Chinese: 可怕的怪物在虎视眈眈，无惧，这个小镇由我来保护。

English: I could use some help fighting them off. If you are interested, feel free to drop by and lend me your assistance.
Simplified_Chinese: 我需要一些帮手来击退他们。如果你有兴趣，请随时光临并给予帮助。

English: Stay within this town and you will be safe from harm. Go and visit Mawrang. He is the oldest and wisest of us all. He will help you survive out in the cold.
Simplified_Chinese: 留在这个城镇，你将免受伤害。去拜访玫然。他是我们当中最年长和最睿智的。他会帮助你在寒冷中生存。

English: Go and visit Mawrang. He is the oldest and wisest of us all. He will help you survive out in the cold.
Simplified_Chinese: 去拜访玫然。他是我们当中最年长和最睿智的。他会帮助你在寒冷中生存。

English: Welcome, brave warrior. I hope this town serves as your safe haven during your perilous journey here.
Simplified_Chinese: 欢迎你，勇士。我希望这个小镇能成为你在这里危险旅程中的避风港。

English: This town could really use your help. We are surrounded in every corner of this continent.
Simplified_Chinese: 这个小镇真的需要你的帮助。我们被怪物包围住了。

English: Our people have a lot of hope, but I fear the threat grows stronger and stronger every day.
Simplified_Chinese: 我们的人民充满希望，但我却惴惴不安，因为威胁每天都在变得越来越强大。

English: We thank you for your help. I hope our hospitality suffices for your needs.
Simplified_Chinese: 感谢您的帮助。希望我们的招待能让您满意。

English: Old Machinery
Simplified_Chinese: 老旧机器

English: So you want to help me fight off masquerpets, huh? Good.
Simplified_Chinese: 所以你想帮我打怪，对吧？甚好。

English: The entrance to Azria was once an industrious place. It is now overrun by ancient machines. Help me bring down their numbers so other travelers may enter this place more safely.
Simplified_Chinese: 阿兹利亚的入口曾经是一个行人络绎不绝的地方。它现在被古老的机器所侵占。帮助我减少它们的数量，以便其他旅行者可以更安全地进入。

English: Will you help me?
Simplified_Chinese: 你会帮我吗？

English: Good. Get going then. The fighting never stops.
Simplified_Chinese: 好的。那就走吧。战斗从未停止。

English: Come back when you think you are ready.
Simplified_Chinese: 当你认为准备好时再回吧。

English: It appears your efforts were a success. Thank you.
Simplified_Chinese: 看来你的努力是有用的。谢谢你。

English: Not enough monsters have been defeated, unfortunately. You must go back and fight.
Simplified_Chinese: 还没有击败足够的怪物。你必须回去战斗。

English: Squash the Sasquatch!
Simplified_Chinese: 压扁大脚怪！

English: We meet again, traveler. We need more help. Rumor has it that the Yetti are becoming more aggressive towards humans. We can't allow this to continue happening.
Simplified_Chinese: 我们又见面了，旅行者。我们需要更多帮助。有传言说，怪力羊对人类的攻击性越来越强。我们不能让这种情况继续发生。

English: Will you lend me a hand once more, traveler?
Simplified_Chinese: 你能再帮我一次吗，旅行者？

English: Please defeat 70 Yetti and 55 Mutant Yetti and return to me as soon as you're finished.
Simplified_Chinese: 请击败 70 只怪力羊和 55 只变异怪力羊，完成后尽快返回找我。

English: Town Fortification
Simplified_Chinese: 城镇防御工事

English: It seems as though the masquerpets are a greater threat than I thought. We will need to fortify our town as soon as possible.
Simplified_Chinese: 看起来怪物的威胁比我想象的要大。我们需要尽快巩固我们的城镇。

English: Bring us some wood and stone. We can make good use of it and reinforce our buildings and fences.
Simplified_Chinese: 带一些木头和石头给我们。我们可以利用它们来加固建筑物和围栏。

English: Please bring back 20 Wood & 20 Stone. You can obtain the Wood from most kinds of Yetti and Stone from most kinds of Augu.
Simplified_Chinese: 请带回 20 个木头和 20 个石头。您可以从大多数种类的怪力羊中获得木材，从大多数尖角蜥中获得石头。

English: That will not be enough, sadly!
Simplified_Chinese: 很可惜，这还不够。

English: Thank you so much! We will put these materials to good use.
Simplified_Chinese: 谢谢你！这些东西会派上好用场的。

English: Now our town is stronger than ever! Unfortunately, we are still lacking a lot of resources.
Simplified_Chinese: 现在我们的城镇比以往任何时候都坚固！不幸的是，我们仍然缺乏很多资源。

English: Azria used to have a field of crystals that we would use for energy and magic, but these have been devoured by a crazed Augu that has gone absolutely mad.
Simplified_Chinese: 阿兹利亚曾经有一片水晶，我们可以用它来制造能量和魔法，但这些已经被一个疯狂的尖角蜥吞噬了。

English: The Glacial Augu is now overpowered from all of this crystal essence and has become nearly unstoppable. Can you help us defeat it and retrieve its crystal essence?
Simplified_Chinese: 冰川尖角蜥现在被水晶精华强化了，变得几乎不可阻挡。你能帮助我们打败它并取回它的水晶精华吗？

English: Good luck!
Simplified_Chinese: 祝你好运！

English: I understand. It's a difficult task. I will wait for you to get stronger.
Simplified_Chinese: 我明白。这是一项艰巨的任务。等你变强后再来试试吧。

English: The Frosty Beast
Simplified_Chinese: 冰霜野兽

English: Amazing! And you did that all by yourself I bet!
Simplified_Chinese: 了不起！我敢打赌，这是你自己一个人做到的。

English: Keep trying! I believe in you!
Simplified_Chinese: 不要放弃！我相信你！

English: Now that we have all of this crystal essence, we can enforce our town and create a magical barrier that no monster, Violet or not, can ever break through.
Simplified_Chinese: 既然我们拥有了所有这些水晶精华，我们就可以强化我们的城镇并创造一个魔法屏障。这个屏障，任何怪物，包括紫罗兰，都无法突破。

English: We thank you for all of your help! Stay safe out there.
Simplified_Chinese: 我们感谢您的所有帮助！在外面注意安全。

English: Lost Souls
Simplified_Chinese: 地狱亡魂

English: While we may be safe for now thanks to your help, the armies of Shade are advancing.
Simplified_Chinese: 虽然多亏了你的帮助，我们现在可能是安全的，但谢莉德的爪牙正在集结。

English: Shade is summoning the very dead to fight against us. Ghosts of the forgotten rulers have completely taken over the old ruins of Azria.
Simplified_Chinese: 谢莉德正在召唤死者与我们作战。被遗忘的幽灵已经完全占领了阿兹利亚雪地的废墟。

English: Bring Mawrang some of their remains so they can be studied. Maybe we can learn something.
Simplified_Chinese: 给玫然带来一些他们的遗骸，以便研究。也许我们可以学到一些东西。

English: Hm... yes... That is interesting.
Simplified_Chinese: 嗯……是的……这很有趣。

English: That may not be enough, hm.
Simplified_Chinese: 这也许还不够，呃..

English: Overlord
Simplified_Chinese: 领主

English: There is very dark and evil power behind these masquerpets. I fear my suspicions are correct.
Simplified_Chinese: 在这些怪物背后，有着非常黑暗和邪恶的力量。我担心我的怀疑是正确的。

English: Some of these masquerpets are being empowered by giant variants. This gives them enough power to break through our barrier!
Simplified_Chinese: 其中一些怪物被巨大的变种赋予了力量。这给了他们足够的力量来突破我们的屏障！

English: We must defeat these giants at once!
Simplified_Chinese: 我们必须立即击败这些巨大怪物！

English: Hurry! We do not have much time left.
Simplified_Chinese: 尽快！留给我们的时间不多了。

English: Very unfortunate...
Simplified_Chinese: 很不幸...

English: That was a close call. Thank you.
Simplified_Chinese: 那可真是千钧一发...谢谢你

English: We must defeat more than that.
Simplified_Chinese: 我们必须打败更多。

English: Our barrier is safe for now, but there appears to be another army approaching much closer now. This one is a far graver threat than any we have ever faced.
Simplified_Chinese: 我们的屏障目前是安全的，但现在似乎有另一支军队正在逼近。这个威胁比我们之前所面临的任何威胁都要严重得多。

English: We must prepare for this battle. Speak to Auxilior as soon as possible.
Simplified_Chinese: 我们必须为这场战斗做好准备。尽快与奥格吉里碰面。

English: There is no time to waste. We must strengthen our magic barrier and gather materials. Slay some Augu and gather what little Crystal Essence they may have shared from the Glacial Augu.
Simplified_Chinese: 没有时间可以浪费了。我们必须加强我们的魔法屏障并收集材料。杀死一些尖角蜥并收集他们可能从冰川尖角蜥得到的少量水晶精华。

English: Once you do, bring us a hammer from a Lord Yetti. This is a formidable weapon that we can use to defend ourselves.
Simplified_Chinese: Once you do, bring us a hammer from a Lord Yetti. This is a formidable weapon that we can use to defend ourselves.

English: Prepare for Battle! (1)
Simplified_Chinese: 战斗准备!(1)

English: Let's go then.
Simplified_Chinese: 我们出发吧。

English: It's time to face off against the Mammoths. The most fearsome and terrible creature I have ever laid my eyes upon in this place.
Simplified_Chinese: 是时候对付猛犸象了。那是我在这个地方见过的最可怕的生物。

English: This will not be an easy battle. May Rhisis be with you.
Simplified_Chinese: 这可不会是一场轻松的战斗啊。愿莱斯神与你同在。

English: Kill 100 Cannibal Mammoths and last but not least, the Lord Mammoth.
Simplified_Chinese: Kill 100 Cannibal Mammoths and last but not least, the Lord Mammoth.

English: You are truly a great warrior and an even greater friend. We owe our lives to you.
Simplified_Chinese: 你真是一个伟大的战士，也是一位值得托付的朋友。我们欠你一条命。

English: We must battle on. I believe in you.
Simplified_Chinese: 战斗不可避免，我相信你！

English: We are safe now. I know this may not be much, but take this as a sign of our appreciation. You will always be remembered here.
Simplified_Chinese: 我们现在很安全。我知道这可能不多，但请收下吧。您的英勇将被永远铭记。

English: Prepare for Battle! (2)
Simplified_Chinese: 战斗准备!(2)

English: Slay Augu and gather Crystal Essence. Also obtain a hammer from a Lord Yetti.
Simplified_Chinese: Slay Augu and gather Crystal Essence. Also obtain a hammer from a Lord Yetti.

English: Raising Pets 1 (Egg -> F Tier)
Simplified_Chinese: 喂养宠物1 (蛋 -> F级)

English: Nice egg, stranger. I'm sure you're wondering what kind of pet you'll get from it. Well, don't get too far ahead of yourself now. I can't guarantee you're going to be able to hatch it.
Simplified_Chinese: 好蛋，陌生人。我敢肯定你想知道你会从中得到什么样的宠物。好吧，现在还为时过早。我不能保证你能孵化它。

English: However, if you really take care of the egg there shouldn't be a problem. All you need to do is get the egg's experience (EXP) to 99.99% and then bring it back to me. Think you can do that?
Simplified_Chinese: 但是，如果你真的照顾好宠物蛋，那就没有问题。你需要做的就是把蛋的经验（EXP）提高到99.99%，然后把它带回来给我。你觉得你能做到吗？

English: Sounds good! Alright, listen. In order to bring your egg's experience to full, you're going to need to feed it while it's summoned. Find yourself some Pet Candy (F) and get started!
Simplified_Chinese: 听起来不错！好吧，听着。为了让你的蛋的获得经验，你需要在它被召唤时喂它。先给自己找点宠物糖果 (F) 吧！

English: Well that's a shame. I can't say I'm surprised, though. From the looks of you, you probably couldn't even keep a cactus alive.
Simplified_Chinese: 好吧，真可惜。不过，我不能说我很惊讶。因为从你的样子看，你可能连仙人掌都养不活。

English: Great job with the egg, stranger! Tell you what, I'll take over from here. It's hatching time!
Simplified_Chinese: 做得很好，陌生人！那么，我会从这开始接管。孵化时间到！

English: You're going to need to get your egg's experience to 99.99% in order for me to hatch it for you. Feel free to stop by again once you've done this!
Simplified_Chinese: 你需要让你的蛋的经验达到 99.99% 才能让我为你孵化它。完成此操作后，请随时再次光临！

English: The Pet Tamer has asked you to feed your egg some Pet Candy until it reaches 99.99% EXP. Once you've done that, return to him and he will hatch it for you!
Simplified_Chinese: 宠物驯兽师要求你给你的蛋喂一些宠物糖果，直到它达到 99.99% 的经验值。完成后，回到他身边，他会为你孵化！

English: Raising Pets 2 (F Tier -> E Tier)
Simplified_Chinese: 喂养宠物2（F 级 -> E 级）

English: Now that you're pet has been hatched, it will increase specific character statistics (Stat Points) depending on the type of pet you have summoned. Every pet type affects a specific character statistic.
Simplified_Chinese: 现在你的宠物已经孵化了，它会根据你召唤的宠物类型增加特定的角色属性点（Stat Points）。每种宠物类型都会影响特定的角色属性点。

English: Feed your pet the appropriate Pet Candy and it will gain experience. If you bring your pet's experience to 99.99% again, I'll upgrade it! How does that sound?
Simplified_Chinese: 喂你的宠物适当的宠物糖果，它会获得经验。如果你再把你的宠物经验提升到99.99%，我就升级它！听上去怎么样？

English: If your pet's energy runs out, it can't help you. When it's energy gets low, you better feed it to keep the bonuses! Now, go and spend some time with your pet! Come back when you've gained enough experience.
Simplified_Chinese: 如果您的宠物的能量耗尽，它将无法帮助您。当它的能量变低时，你最好喂它以保持获得属性加成！现在，去和你的宠物共度时光吧！当你获得足够的经验后回来。

English: Really? You're not interested in advancing your pet's abilities? Fine, have it your way. What a shame…
Simplified_Chinese: 真的吗？您对提升宠物的能力不感兴趣吗？好吧，随你吧。多可惜…

English: Great job with your pet, my friend! I'll take it from here!
Simplified_Chinese: 我的朋友，做得很好！那么就交给我了！

English: You need to spend more time with your pet. It hasn't acquired enough experience to be upgraded yet. Stop back by when his experience reaches 99.99%!
Simplified_Chinese: 你需要花更多的时间陪伴你的宠物。它还没有获得足够的经验来升级。当它的经验达到 99.99% 时停下来！

English: Bring your pet's experience to 99.99% and the Pet Tamer will upgrade it for you!
Simplified_Chinese: 将宠物的经验提升至 99.99%，驯宠师会为你升级！

English: Raising Pets 3 (E Tier -> D Tier)
Simplified_Chinese: 喂养宠物3（E 级 -> D 级）

English: The higher the level granted for a particular tier (F, E, D, C, B, A or S), the higher the affected character statistic will be. The level granted is always random. Cool huh?
Simplified_Chinese: 授予特定等级（F、E、D、C、B、A 或 S）的级别越高，受影响的角色属性点就越高。授予的级别始终是随机的。酷吧？

English: E Tier Pets such as this one have 2 levels available (1 - 2) and you achieved a random level during the last upgrade. Will you see me when your pet reaches 99.99% experience again?
Simplified_Chinese: 像这样的E 级宠物有2个可用级别（1 - 2），您在上次升级期间获得了一个随机级别。当你的宠物再次达到 99.99% 经验时，还会见我吧？

English: Great! I'll see you when you get back. Good luck, and don't forget to feed your pet!
Simplified_Chinese: 很好！期待下次见面。祝你好运，别忘了喂你的宠物！

English: Don't give up now, you're doing such a great job!
Simplified_Chinese: 不要现在放弃，你做得很好！

English: The two of you are becoming stronger together, and it looks like you guys have become pretty good friends in the process. Excellent! I will upgrade your pet to D tier now!
Simplified_Chinese: 你们两个一起变得越来越强大，看起来你们在这个过程中成为了很好的朋友。很好！我现在就把你的宠物升级到D级！

English: Stop back by when your pet reaches 99.99% experience.
Simplified_Chinese: 当您的宠物达到 99.99% 的经验值时再回来。

English: Raising Pets 4 (D Tier -> C Tier)
Simplified_Chinese: 喂养宠物4（D 级 -> C 级）

English: Excellent job raising your pet so far, my friend. You two certainly look happy together!
Simplified_Chinese: 我的朋友，到目前为止，做得很好。你们两个在一起肯定很幸福！

English: I'm sure you've noticed by now that the higher the level granted for a particular tier, the higher the benefit to your Stats.
Simplified_Chinese: 我相信您现在已经注意到，特定等级授予的级别越高，对您的属性的好处就越高。

English: No pain, no gain. I'm sure you know the drill by now. Bring the experience of your pet to 99.99% and bring it back to me. I will upgrade it when your done.
Simplified_Chinese: 一分耕耘一分收获。我敢肯定你现在已经知道这个了。把你宠物的经验提升到 99.99% 再来找我。你完成后我会升级它。

English: The two of you are becoming stronger together, and it looks like you guys have become pretty good friends in the process. Excellent! I will upgrade your pet to C tier now!
Simplified_Chinese: 你们两个一起变得越来越强大，看起来你们在这个过程中成为了很好的朋友。很棒！我现在就把你的宠物升级到C级！

English: Not quite there… your pet needs more experience. I'm sure you already knew that.
Simplified_Chinese: 还不够……你的宠物需要更多的经验。我相信你已经知道了。

English: Raising Pets 5 (C Tier -> B Tier)
Simplified_Chinese: 喂养宠物5（C 级 -> B 级）

English: I can see that you and your pet have been through a great deal together. You're almost there!
Simplified_Chinese: 我看到你和你的宠物一起经历了很多。就快到了！

English: I'll upgrade your pet to *S level* using magic handed down through my family. All you have to do is get the experience of your pet to 99.99%. You've done it before, will you do it the one last time?
Simplified_Chinese: 我会用我家传下来的魔法把你的宠物升级到*S级*。您所要做的就是让您的宠物的经验达到99.99％。你以前做过，你会做最后一次吗？

English: I knew you would. It looks like both you and your pet are ready to begin.
Simplified_Chinese: 我知道你会的。看起来您和您的宠物都准备好开始了。

English: Does this mean you are giving up on your pet?
Simplified_Chinese: 这是否意味着你放弃了你的宠物？

English: Congratulations! As long as you have your pet, you will never be alone. Your pet seems to be very happy, you've done a great job. Now allow me to apply the final upgrade!
Simplified_Chinese: 恭喜！只要你有你的宠物，你就永远不会孤单。你的宠物似乎很高兴，你做得很好。现在请允许我完成最终的升级！

English: You are so close to getting your pet to its ultimate level. Do not give up now.
Simplified_Chinese: 你让你的宠物离最高水平如此接近。现在不要放弃。

English: Raising Pets 6 (B Tier -> A Tier)
Simplified_Chinese: 喂养宠物6（B 级 -> A 级）

English: The two of you are becoming stronger together, and it looks like you guys have become pretty good friends in the process. Excellent! I will upgrade your pet to B tier now!
Simplified_Chinese: 你们两个一起变得越来越强大，看起来你们在这个过程中成为了很好的朋友。很好！我现在就把你的宠物升级到B级！

English: Raising Pets 7 (A Tier -> S Tier)
Simplified_Chinese: 喂养宠物7（A 级 -> S 级）

English: The two of you are becoming stronger together, and it looks like you guys have become pretty good friends in the process. Excellent! I will upgrade your pet to A tier now!
Simplified_Chinese: 你们两个一起变得越来越强大，看起来你们在这个过程中成为了很好的朋友。很好！我现在就把你的宠物升级到A级！

English: Volkane
Simplified_Chinese: 熔岩秘境

English: Finding the Guardians
Simplified_Chinese: 寻找守护者

English: A great terror lies within this volcano. A cataclysmic maelstrom is said to have erupted this volcano and carved out these caverns.
Simplified_Chinese: 这座火山是危险之地。据说是一场灾难性的大漩涡喷发形成了这座火山和这些洞穴。

English: The Red Meteonyker is one of the most dangerous Masquerpets in all of Madrigal. As a fearsome creation of Shade, I do not know of many who have survived his fiery breath. This abomination has been sealed away for many ages.
Simplified_Chinese: 红龙是整个瑞加中最危险的怪物之一。作为一个可怕的谢莉德创造物，我不知道有没有人能在它炽热的呼吸中活下来。这个可憎的东西已经被封印了很多年。

English: Many adventurers like yourself who battle Masquerpets in Darkon are unaware of the grave danger that lies below them. The walls are giving way and the Red Meteonyker may not be tempered much longer.
Simplified_Chinese: 许多像你一样在达肯与怪物战斗的冒险家都没有意识到他们身下的大危机。墙壁正在坍塌，红龙可能要解除封印了。

English: You think you can face the Red Meteonyker? I do not wish such a grim fate on anyone. However... you have survived the horrors of Darkon, so you must be very strong. Maybe I am being too skeptical. There may be some hope after all.
Simplified_Chinese: 你认为你可以挑战红龙？我不希望有人承受如此严峻的命运。但是……你在达肯的恐怖地带中存活了下来，所以你一定很强。也许是我多虑了。毕竟这也不是不可能。

English: Many of us guardians were annihilated when sealing the Red Meteonyker away. Only three of us are left, and each of us holds a piece of the key needed to enter the lair of the Red Meteonyker. You must find them and obtain each piece.
Simplified_Chinese: 我们中的许多守护者在封印红龙时牺牲了。最后只剩下三个人了，我们每个人都拿着一把进入红龙巢穴所需的钥匙。你必须找齐它们。

English: Can you help me find my long-lost guardian allies and defeat the Red Meteonyker once and for all?
Simplified_Chinese: 你能帮我找到失散多年的守护者队友并一劳永逸地击败红龙吗？

English: Very well. Here is the first piece of the key. There are threats in this cavern other than the Red Meteonyker. Good luck.
Simplified_Chinese: 很好。这是钥匙的第一部分。除了红龙，这里还有其他威胁。祝你好运。

English: Wise decision. Stay safe, traveler.
Simplified_Chinese: 明智的决定。注意安全，旅行者。

English: You have not found any guardians yet? That is fine. We will find them eventually.
Simplified_Chinese: 还没找到守护者？别灰心。我们一定会找到他们的。

English: Find Obnis.
Simplified_Chinese: 找到欧比涅斯

English: Kumah is alive? I see. And I see you have one of the three pieces of the key with you. You must be fearless for wanting to face the Red Meteonyker alone.
Simplified_Chinese: 库马还活着？我懂了。我看到你随身带着三把钥匙之一。想要独自面对 Red Meteonyker，你必须无所畏惧。

English: As Kumah may have told you, our power is not as strong as it once was. This place takes a toll on your strength.
Simplified_Chinese: 正如库马所言，我们的力量不像以前那么强大了。这个地方会消耗你的力量。

English: I have unfortunately been trapped in this spot for a while. I can take on Meteonykers, but some powerful Berserk Meteonykers have been swarming the place in search of us guardians.
Simplified_Chinese: 不幸的是，我被困在这个地方有一段时间了。我可以对付一些飞龙，但一些强大的狂暴飞龙已经蜂拥而至，在寻找我们的守护者。

English: Can you help me escape? In return, I will give you the second piece of the key you will need to enter the lair of the Red Meteonyker.
Simplified_Chinese: 你能帮我脱离危险吗？作为回报，我会给你第二把钥匙。

English: Why thank you, kind stranger. I will wait here for you.
Simplified_Chinese: 谢谢你，善良的陌生人。我会在这里等你。

English: Hmph. I'll just give up then...
Simplified_Chinese: 呃，那我就放弃了...

English: I knew I could count on you!
Simplified_Chinese: 我知道我可以依靠你！

English: My dear traveler, there are still too many Berserk Meteonykers!
Simplified_Chinese: 亲爱的旅行者，狂暴飞龙还是太多了！

English: Finding the Guardians (2)
Simplified_Chinese: 寻找守护者 (2)

English: Finding the Guardians (3)
Simplified_Chinese: 寻找守护者 (3)

English: Test of Strength
Simplified_Chinese: 能力测试

English: Kill 3 Berserk Meteonykers
Simplified_Chinese: 杀死3只狂暴飞龙

English: There is only one piece left, in the hands of our fellow guardian Airon. She is stubborn though, and you might need to convince her... if you can find her.
Simplified_Chinese: 只剩下最后一把了，它在我们的守护者艾隆手中。不过她很固执，你可能需要说服她……如果你能找到她的话。

English: The other two guardians may still be alive, but you are foolish to come here. Nobody is strong enough to face the Red Meteonyker.
Simplified_Chinese: 其他两个守护者可能还活着，但你来这里，是极其愚蠢的决定。没有人强大到足以面对 红龙。

English: Kumah spoke to you? That's okay. He has too much faith in people. I'm a bit of a skeptic. Nothing has ever gone right in this terrible place for us.
Simplified_Chinese: 库马跟你说话了？真是的，他太相信别人了。对我们来说，在这个鬼地方，没有发生过任何好事。

English: Show me a convincing display of your strength. This chamber is filled with Katamaws, a ferocious beast that cannot be tamed. Kill 70 of them and I may consider trusting your abilities.
Simplified_Chinese: 给我一个令人信服的展示你的力量。这个房间里充满了 Katamaws，一种无法驯服的凶猛野兽。杀掉70个，我可能会考虑相信你的能力。

English: Go on then.
Simplified_Chinese: 去吧。

English: You surprise me. I was wrong about you.
Simplified_Chinese: 看来你有点本事。

English: That's not nearly enough.
Simplified_Chinese: 还不够。

English: I kept my word. You now have all three pieces of the key.
Simplified_Chinese: 我信守诺言。给，第三个钥匙。

English: In order to merge them and unlock the entrance to the Red Meteonyker, you must find a guardian forger.
Simplified_Chinese: 为了合并它们并解锁红龙的入口，你必须找到一个守护锻造者。

English: Most were wiped out long ago. You must find any survivors and bring the key together once again.
Simplified_Chinese: 大多数在很久以前就被消灭了。你必须找到任何还存在的铸造者并再次将钥匙放在一起。

English: What brings you here?
Simplified_Chinese: 什么风把你吹到这的？

English: Airon sent you? And I see you have all three pieces of the key. Then there is no time to waste.
Simplified_Chinese: 艾隆派你来的？我看到你拥有三把钥匙。那么就没必要浪费时间了。

English: I can reforge the key for you, but I require a lot of life source to do so.
Simplified_Chinese: 我可以为你重铸钥匙，但我需要大量的生命本源。

English: Ever since the Red Meteonyker has been wreaking havoc in his chamber, the armies of Shade have swarmed this place. Cyclops X are everywhere, and the entrance is now kept by undead guardians.
Simplified_Chinese: Ever since the Red Meteonyker has been wreaking havoc in his chamber, the armies of Shade have swarmed this place. Cyclops X are everywhere, and the entrance is now kept by undead guardians.

English: Weaken the armies of the Cyclops X and defeat their lieutenant to obtain one of their life gems and bring it to me.
Simplified_Chinese: 削弱独眼巨人的军队力量并击败他们的中尉，以获得他们的一颗生命宝石并将其带给我。

English: Now stand back as I forge the key.
Simplified_Chinese: 退后，我要重铸钥匙了。

English: This is no time to play games. Go now and finish the task. We must hurry!
Simplified_Chinese: 这不是玩戏的时间。快去完成任务。我们要快点！

English: I can't believe it. You achieved the impossible.
Simplified_Chinese: 我不敢相信。你实现了不可能。

English: Why are you still here? You must defeat the Red Meteonyker!
Simplified_Chinese: 你为什么还在这儿？快去打败红龙！

English: I would say your victory calls for a celebration, but the armies of Shade are still here. There is a lot left to do in this forsaken place.
Simplified_Chinese: 你的胜利值得庆祝，但谢莉德的军队仍然在这里。在这个被遗弃的地方还有很多事情要做。

English: You are a lot more powerful than I thought you were. I am sure the other guardians are proud of your victory. I know I am. Thank you.
Simplified_Chinese: 你比我想象的要强大得多。我相信其他守护者会为你的胜利感到自豪，谢谢你。

English: The Red Meteonyker
Simplified_Chinese: 赤红飞龙

English: Here it is. The key has been reforged just as planned. Quickly now, go and defeat the Red Meteonyker before it's too late! You must fight through the hoard of undead guardians. Good luck.
Simplified_Chinese: 钥匙已按计划重铸。现在，快点！赶在为时已晚之前打败红龙！祝你好运。

English: I can't believe it. You achieved the impossible.
Simplified_Chinese: 我不敢相信。你实现了不可能。

English: Quickly now, go and defeat the Red Meteonyker before it's too late! You must fight through the hoard of undead guardians. Good luck.
Simplified_Chinese: 快点！赶在为时已晚之前打败红龙！祝你好运。

English: Defeat the Red Meteonyker!
Simplified_Chinese: 击败红龙！

English: Master
Simplified_Chinese: 大师

English: Master Grade (1)
Simplified_Chinese: 大师进阶(1)

English: Reach level 70
Simplified_Chinese: 达到70级

English: Do you really think you’re the strongest? You’re wrong. You can be stronger! Listen... What if I told you that you could... relive certain moments of your life? It would be crazy, wouldn’t it?
Simplified_Chinese: Do you really think you’re the strongest? You’re wrong. You can be stronger! Listen... What if I told you that you could... relive certain moments of your life? It would be crazy, wouldn’t it?

English: I have a proposal for you. I take a few levels from you, of course temporarily, and you will accomplish a task for me. What do you have to gain? Everything!
Simplified_Chinese: 我有个建议。我从你那里扣掉一些等级，当然只是暂时的，然后你为我完成一项任务。你能获得什么好处？应有尽有!

English: I’m bringing you down to level 60, and when you get to level 70, come back to me! I’ll give you back your previous levels with a little gift.
Simplified_Chinese: I’m bringing you down to level 60, and when you get to level 70, come back to me! I’ll give you back your previous levels with a little gift.

English: Be careful though, your experience will be halved for the duration of this short mission!
Simplified_Chinese: 但是要小心，在短暂的任务期间你的经验会减半！

English: Obviously, if you change your mind, you can abandon the quest at any time through your quest window and I will give you back your levels, of course!
Simplified_Chinese: 当然，如果改变了主意你可以在任何时候通过任务窗口放弃任务，然后当然我会把你的等级还给你！

English: So, what do you think?
Simplified_Chinese: So, what do you think?

English: Perfect! I've taken your levels, come back to me when you reach the goal of our arrangement!
Simplified_Chinese: Perfect! I've taken your levels, come back to me when you reach the goal of our arrangement!

English: Oh I see... you’re probably too weak.
Simplified_Chinese: Oh I see... you’re probably too weak.

English: Wonderful! So I give you back your levels, and the little gift with it! Thank you for your help and see you soon!
Simplified_Chinese: Wonderful! So I give you back your levels, and the little gift with it! Thank you for your help and see you soon!

English: You haven’t been able to complete our arrangement? Too bad, others will!
Simplified_Chinese: You haven’t been able to complete our arrangement? Too bad, others will!

English: Master Grade (2)
Simplified_Chinese: 大师进阶(2)

English: Here you are again!? The last time was too easy... What if we put it back but a notch up?
Simplified_Chinese: Here you are again!? The last time was too easy... What if we put it back but a notch up?

English: Like last time, I take your levels and you go back up! As simple as that!
Simplified_Chinese: Like last time, I take your levels and you go back up! As simple as that!

English: And like last time, if you want to resume your previous progression, you can cancel the quest, you will resume the progression of the latter by resuming the quest!
Simplified_Chinese: And like last time, if you want to resume your previous progression, you can cancel the quest, you will resume the progression of the latter by resuming the quest!

English: This time, it will be from level 70 to 80! So, shall we go?
Simplified_Chinese: This time, it will be from level 70 to 80! So, shall we go?

English: Great! Then I’ll wait here!
Simplified_Chinese: Great! Then I’ll wait here!

English: No problem, just come back!
Simplified_Chinese: No problem, just come back!

English: Great! I expected no less from you. Here’s your reward.
Simplified_Chinese: Great! I expected no less from you. Here’s your reward.

English: Reach level 80
Simplified_Chinese: 达到80级

English: Master Grade (3)
Simplified_Chinese: 大师进阶(3)

English: The last time you finished your task in no time. What do you think? Let’s go back?
Simplified_Chinese: The last time you finished your task in no time. What do you think? Let’s go back?

English: The rules are not changing, so what are we waiting for?
Simplified_Chinese: The rules are not changing, so what are we waiting for?

English: This time, it will be from level 80 to 90! So, shall we go?
Simplified_Chinese: This time, it will be from level 80 to 90! So, shall we go?

English: Reach level 90
Simplified_Chinese: 达到90级

English: Master Grade (4)
Simplified_Chinese: 大师进阶(4)

English: We’re almost done, don’t worry. But for now, let’s keep going?
Simplified_Chinese: We’re almost done, don’t worry. But for now, let’s keep going?

English: And yes, as usual, same rules!
Simplified_Chinese: And yes, as usual, same rules!

English: This time, it will be from level 90 to 100! So, shall we go?
Simplified_Chinese: This time, it will be from level 90 to 100! So, shall we go?

English: Reach level 100
Simplified_Chinese: 达到100级

English: Master Grade (5)
Simplified_Chinese: 大师进阶(5)

English: One more and then it’s the last!
Simplified_Chinese: One more and then it’s the last!

English: This time, it will be from level 100 to 110! So, shall we go?
Simplified_Chinese: This time, it will be from level 100 to 110! So, shall we go?

English: Reach level 110
Simplified_Chinese: 达到110级

English: Master Grade (6)
Simplified_Chinese: 大师进阶(6)

English: Here we are! This is one of the last missions I have for you at the moment. Are you still motivated?
Simplified_Chinese: Here we are! This is one of the last missions I have for you at the moment. Are you still motivated?

English: This time, it will be from level 110 to 120! So, shall we go?

English: It’s almost Christmas, as you know. And I forgot to prepare my snowman...
Simplified_Chinese: It’s almost Christmas, as you know. And I forgot to prepare my snowman...

English: Can you get me $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,2$ snowballs and $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$ carrots before midnight ?
Simplified_Chinese: Can you get me $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,2$ snowballs and $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$ carrots before midnight ?

Simplified_Chinese: You can find the snowballs on the ground, but I think all the monsters picked them up... So you’ll have to eliminate a few to get them back.

English: If you’re not interested in the Christmas spirit, it’s useless.

English: You did it! Thanks to you Christmas is saved! Unless the monsters destroy the snowmen and take back the carrots...

English: Well, I guess picking up snow and carrots is too hard for you, huh...

English: Daily Quests
Simplified_Chinese: Daily Quests

English: Saving Private Leo
Simplified_Chinese: Saving Private Leo

English: Private Leo has been trapped in the dungeon and sent an SOS sign!\nPlease save Private Leo!
Simplified_Chinese: Private Leo has been trapped in the dungeon and sent an SOS sign!\nPlease save Private Leo!

English: Private Leo seems to be injured so please hurry!
Simplified_Chinese: Private Leo seems to be injured so please hurry!

English: I have misjudged you! I’ll look for another person, now begone!
Simplified_Chinese: I have misjudged you! I’ll look for another person, now begone!

English: I've heard Private Leo has been successfully rescued! Please accept this reward!
Simplified_Chinese: I've heard Private Leo has been successfully rescued! Please accept this reward!

English: Has Private Leo been rescued yet?
Simplified_Chinese: Has Private Leo been rescued yet?

English: Visit dungeon NPC to learn all about Event
Simplified_Chinese: Visit dungeon NPC to learn all about Event

English: Rescue the missing childrens
Simplified_Chinese: Rescue the missing childrens

English: The children from the town have gone missing... Please rescue them from the monsters!
Simplified_Chinese: The children from the town have gone missing... Please rescue them from the monsters!

English: I need you to save $QUEST_END_TRIGGERCTRL_COUNT$ childrens in any dungeon, before midnight.
Simplified_Chinese: I need you to save $QUEST_END_TRIGGERCTRL_COUNT$ childrens in any dungeon, before midnight.

English: You can find childrens in any dungeon. They will be in a cage and you will just have to get the key from the boss to save them!
Simplified_Chinese: You can find childrens in any dungeon. They will be in a cage and you will just have to get the key from the boss to save them!

English: If I'm right, children's lives don't matter to you? No problem.
Simplified_Chinese: If I'm right, children's lives don't matter to you? No problem.

English: You saved the childrens! Thank you very much, you're my hero!
Simplified_Chinese: You saved the childrens! Thank you very much, you're my hero!

English: Someone else saved them. You were too slow and incompetent.
Simplified_Chinese: Someone else saved them. You were too slow and incompetent.

English: I need to rescue $QUEST_END_TRIGGERCTRL_COUNT$ childrens in any dungeon by midnight.
Simplified_Chinese: I need to rescue $QUEST_END_TRIGGERCTRL_COUNT$ childrens in any dungeon by midnight.

English: Make Monster Shaved Ice
Simplified_Chinese: Make Monster Shaved Ice

English: It's definitely hot today.\nThere's a special food that can blow this heat away, do you want to know?
Simplified_Chinese: It's definitely hot today.\nThere's a special food that can blow this heat away, do you want to know?

English: Don't be surprised! It's Monster Shaved Ice!\nIt's a special recipe by me with monster ingredients.\nIf you want know how it tastes, go find the ingredients before the ice melts!
Simplified_Chinese: Don't be surprised! It's Monster Shaved Ice!\nIt's a special recipe by me with monster ingredients.\nIf you want know how it tastes, go find the ingredients before the ice melts!

English: You're not curious? You must not be too hot...
Simplified_Chinese: You're not curious? You must not be too hot...

English: Here you go! Hurry up and try it before it melts!
Simplified_Chinese: Here you go! Hurry up and try it before it melts!

English: Oh why are you so late? Your ice already melted and it can't be used...
Simplified_Chinese: Oh why are you so late? Your ice already melted and it can't be used...

English: Are you still collecting?\nIf the ice melts, we can't make the shaved ice so hurry up!
Simplified_Chinese: Are you still collecting?\nIf the ice melts, we can't make the shaved ice so hurry up!

English: Defeat the monsters before the ice metls and return to Sotta\n(Can redo the quest if failed)
Simplified_Chinese: Defeat the monsters before the ice metls and return to Sotta\n(Can redo the quest if failed)

English: Coral Island
Simplified_Chinese: 珊瑚岛

English: Clouds Over Coral Island
Simplified_Chinese: Clouds Over Coral Island

English: Hero, the clouds over the island to the southeast have finally cleared!
Simplified_Chinese: Hero, the clouds over the island to the southeast have finally cleared!

English: For the longest time we have been unable to travel to the famed Coral Island. I wonder who or what caused the clouds to dissipate?
Simplified_Chinese: For the longest time we have been unable to travel to the famed Coral Island. I wonder who or what caused the clouds to dissipate?

English: Regardless of the reason, perhaps you should go pay a visit to the island and see what's new.
Simplified_Chinese: Regardless of the reason, perhaps you should go pay a visit to the island and see what's new.

English: Many years ago a skilled blacksmith from Darken City named BoBu traveled through the fog in search for rare materials. Go seek out Coral Island and see if BoBu managed to survive.
Simplified_Chinese: Many years ago a skilled blacksmith from Darken City named BoBu traveled through the fog in search for rare materials. Go seek out Coral Island and see if BoBu managed to survive.

English: I understand hero, Coral Island has been uncharted territory for many years... Come back to me if you change your mind.
Simplified_Chinese: I understand hero, Coral Island has been uncharted territory for many years... Come back to me if you change your mind.

English: Hello there traveler, I didn't expect to see one of you so soon after the clouds around Coral Island were lifted...
Simplified_Chinese: Hello there traveler, I didn't expect to see one of you so soon after the clouds around Coral Island were lifted...

English: Go seek out Coral Island and see if BoBu managed to survive.
Simplified_Chinese: Go seek out Coral Island and see if BoBu managed to survive.

English: Find Your Bearings
Simplified_Chinese: Find Your Bearings

English: Long ago I sailed into the mist that surrounded this island, hoping to discover something new and untouched in the land of Madrigal.
Simplified_Chinese: Long ago I sailed into the mist that surrounded this island, hoping to discover something new and untouched in the land of Madrigal.

English: I found Coral Island nestled deep into the clouds, but something kept me from ever leaving.
Simplified_Chinese: I found Coral Island nestled deep into the clouds, but something kept me from ever leaving.

English: The mist that covered the island held some magic that prevented those who arrived from escaping.
Simplified_Chinese: The mist that covered the island held some magic that prevented those who arrived from escaping.

English: With Coral Island open to all, we may begin seeing more travelers arrive over time. For now, go introduce yourself to Sunny Pang. Sunny Pang will help you in your adventures around the island.
Simplified_Chinese: With Coral Island open to all, we may begin seeing more travelers arrive over time. For now, go introduce yourself to Sunny Pang. Sunny Pang will help you in your adventures around the island.

English: Take your time, the island has a lot to offer. Come back to me when you are ready.
Simplified_Chinese: Take your time, the island has a lot to offer. Come back to me when you are ready.

English: Wow, it's a real adventure! It's been so long since we've had anyone come visit Coral Island. I wasn't sure this day would ever come!
Simplified_Chinese: Wow, it's a real adventure! It's been so long since we've had anyone come visit Coral Island. I wasn't sure this day would ever come!

English: Introduce yourself to Sunny Pang.
Simplified_Chinese: Introduce yourself to Sunny Pang.

English: An Island Shrouded in Mystery
Simplified_Chinese: An Island Shrouded in Mystery

English: Those who call Coral Island their home have been unable to explore the world due to a curse placed on the island many years ago.
Simplified_Chinese: Those who call Coral Island their home have been unable to explore the world due to a curse placed on the island many years ago.

English: The cause of the cursed mist that has kept the Coral Island inhabitants trapped is unknown.
Simplified_Chinese: The cause of the cursed mist that has kept the Coral Island inhabitants trapped is unknown.

English: However with the mist cleared from around the island, we can finally welcome fresh new faces to help us defend our small village!
Simplified_Chinese: However with the mist cleared from around the island, we can finally welcome fresh new faces to help us defend our small village!

English: Coral Island is a dangerous place. To prove you are an adventurer capable of surviving the dangers here, I want you to go explore the island and take down 200 of any kind of Atrox.
Simplified_Chinese: Coral Island is a dangerous place. To prove you are an adventurer capable of surviving the dangers here, I want you to go explore the island and take down 200 of any kind of Atrox.

English: We didn't expect everyone that arrived to be strong enough for this place. Perhaps you can return to Darken City.
Simplified_Chinese: We didn't expect everyone that arrived to be strong enough for this place. Perhaps you can return to Darken City.

English: I am impressed! Atrox are dangerous beasts known to cut down most creatures that approach them. You have proven yourself.
Simplified_Chinese: I am impressed! Atrox are dangerous beasts known to cut down most creatures that approach them. You have proven yourself.

English: Atrox are dangerous foes, you'll need to successfully defeat more of them to prove yourself to me.
Simplified_Chinese: Atrox are dangerous foes, you'll need to successfully defeat more of them to prove yourself to me.

English: Defeat 200 of any kind of Atrox, then return to Sunny Pang.
Simplified_Chinese: Defeat 200 of any kind of Atrox, then return to Sunny Pang.

English: Clear the Paths
Simplified_Chinese: Clear the Paths

English: Word has been going around the village about a strong new visitor that can hold their own against the ferocities of Coral Island.
Simplified_Chinese: Word has been going around the village about a strong new visitor that can hold their own against the ferocities of Coral Island.

English: The number of Tigars on the island have exploded recently, and we're not sure why. It's hardly safe to walk along the paths of Coral Island anymore.
Simplified_Chinese: The number of Tigars on the island have exploded recently, and we're not sure why. It's hardly safe to walk along the paths of Coral Island anymore.

English: If you are willing to help us, go hunt enough Tigars to keep our paths safe for a while. Around 300 should do.
Simplified_Chinese: If you are willing to help us, go hunt enough Tigars to keep our paths safe for a while. Around 300 should do.

English: Perhaps no one is powerful enough to defeat the Tigars.
Simplified_Chinese: Perhaps no one is powerful enough to defeat the Tigars.

English: Incredible, thank you for your efforts! We can safely travel around the land paths of the island again.
Simplified_Chinese: Incredible, thank you for your efforts! We can safely travel around the land paths of the island again.

English: Tigars hide in the grass, waiting to strike their prey. In just one NaNosecond they pounce to attack.
Simplified_Chinese: Tigars hide in the grass, waiting to strike their prey. In just one NaNosecond they pounce to attack.

English: Defeat 300 of any kind of Tigar, then return to Talus.
Simplified_Chinese: Defeat 300 of any kind of Tigar, then return to Talus.

English: Pirates and Their Pet
Simplified_Chinese: Pirates and Their Pet

English: Your reputation continues to grow in our little village, hero!
Simplified_Chinese: Your reputation continues to grow in our little village, hero!

English: The Meral pirates of Coral Island have managed to tame a Lord Tigar. Those thieves have threatened to come rob and destroy our homes.
Simplified_Chinese: The Meral pirates of Coral Island have managed to tame a Lord Tigar. Those thieves have threatened to come rob and destroy our homes.

English: Defeat the pirates and their gigantic pet before they destroy everything we've built!
Simplified_Chinese: Defeat the pirates and their gigantic pet before they destroy everything we've built!

English: I wouldn't want to be eaten by a Lord Tigar either. Understandable.
Simplified_Chinese: I wouldn't want to be eaten by a Lord Tigar either. Understandable.

English: I knew you could do it, hero! For now we can rest, knowing that our village is safe from the Meral pirates and their Lord Tigar!
Simplified_Chinese: I knew you could do it, hero! For now we can rest, knowing that our village is safe from the Meral pirates and their Lord Tigar!

English: Merals and their pet Tigar are terribly powerful. You'll need to be strong to defeat them.
Simplified_Chinese: Merals and their pet Tigar are terribly powerful. You'll need to be strong to defeat them.

English: Collect 30 Pristine Pirate Lens from any kind of Meral, and a Gigantic Feline Fang from a Lord Tigar.
Simplified_Chinese: Collect 30 Pristine Pirate Lens from any kind of Meral, and a Gigantic Feline Fang from a Lord Tigar.

English: King of the Pirates!
Simplified_Chinese: King of the Pirates!

English: Woaw, welcome to Coral Island hero! Let me tell you a story of legend, if you don't mind.
Simplified_Chinese: Woaw, welcome to Coral Island hero! Let me tell you a story of legend, if you don't mind.

English: Long ago, a huge Meral was once blessed by Shade. The Meral grew twisted and grotesque, but filled with dark power.
Simplified_Chinese: Long ago, a huge Meral was once blessed by Shade. The Meral grew twisted and grotesque, but filled with dark power.

English: Soon the Overlord Meral became the King of the Pirates of Coral Island, ruling with an iron hook.
Simplified_Chinese: Soon the Overlord Meral became the King of the Pirates of Coral Island, ruling with an iron hook.

English: Wehehehe, if you defeated that Overlord Meral maybe YOU could become King of the Pirates!
Simplified_Chinese: Wehehehe, if you defeated that Overlord Meral maybe YOU could become King of the Pirates!

English: I guess we will never know if the legend of the Meral King is true.
Simplified_Chinese: I guess we will never know if the legend of the Meral King is true.

English: Woah woah woah! You defeated the King of the Pirates? And that stone...
Simplified_Chinese: Woah woah woah! You defeated the King of the Pirates? And that stone...

English: It seems this one piece of stone is filled with purple magic... this is definitely the work of Shade.
Simplified_Chinese: It seems this one piece of stone is filled with purple magic... this is definitely the work of Shade.

English: Fufufu, the only thing that bothers me is that there is legend of a second piece of magic stone hidden on this island. Maybe one day the two of us will discover where it's hiding!
Simplified_Chinese: Fufufu, the only thing that bothers me is that there is legend of a second piece of magic stone hidden on this island. Maybe one day the two of us will discover where it's hiding!

English: To find out if the legend is true, you'll need to defeat the Overlord Meral.
Simplified_Chinese: To find out if the legend is true, you'll need to defeat the Overlord Meral.

English: Defeat the Overlord Meral to collect the Purple Pirate Insignia.
Simplified_Chinese: Defeat the Overlord Meral to collect the Purple Pirate Insignia.

English: Island Delicacies
Simplified_Chinese: Island Delicacies

English: Ha! You have really made a name for yourself here on Coral Island, hero. Everyone has told me of the amazing feats you've accomplished.
Simplified_Chinese: Ha! You have really made a name for yourself here on Coral Island, hero. Everyone has told me of the amazing feats you've accomplished.

English: If you want to prove yourself further, help us defeat the legion of Naga that have taken over the island.
Simplified_Chinese: If you want to prove yourself further, help us defeat the legion of Naga that have taken over the island.

English: To safely take on the Naga, first you'll need to gather bait made of their favorite foods. You can make bait from any type of Kingster or Creper! Meet up with Pau Pau and he'll prepare everything.
Simplified_Chinese: To safely take on the Naga, first you'll need to gather bait made of their favorite foods. You can make bait from any type of Kingster or Creper! Meet up with Pau Pau and he'll prepare everything.

English: Everyone's adventure comes to a close one day. That's alright, hero.
Simplified_Chinese: Everyone's adventure comes to a close one day. That's alright, hero.

English: Woaw, nice job hero! We can make plenty of bait with all this to lower the guard of the Naga! For now, take a rest. We'll make a plan of attack later.
Simplified_Chinese: Woaw, nice job hero! We can make plenty of bait with all this to lower the guard of the Naga! For now, take a rest. We'll make a plan of attack later.

English: Keep fighting Kingster or Creper until you've found enough bait.
Simplified_Chinese: Keep fighting Kingster or Creper until you've found enough bait.

English: Defeat any kind of Kingster or Creper until you've made 200 Island Bait.
Simplified_Chinese: Defeat any kind of Kingster or Creper until you've made 200 Island Bait.

English: Lizard People
Simplified_Chinese: Lizard People

English: I hope you're feeling rested after making all that bait with Pau Pau!
Simplified_Chinese: I hope you're feeling rested after making all that bait with Pau Pau!

English: It's time to go on the offensive and take down as many of the Naga as we can.
Simplified_Chinese: It's time to go on the offensive and take down as many of the Naga as we can.

English: Okay hero, go out there and defeat the Naga before they come eat us!
Simplified_Chinese: Okay hero, go out there and defeat the Naga before they come eat us!

English: The Naga are ferocious, there's no shame in saying no.
Simplified_Chinese: The Naga are ferocious, there's no shame in saying no.

English: Incredible! Truly amazing! You've conquered the Naga, and nearly all of Coral Island!
Simplified_Chinese: Incredible! Truly amazing! You've conquered the Naga, and nearly all of Coral Island!

English: Hopefully soon our village can sleep without keeping one eye open.
Simplified_Chinese: Hopefully soon our village can sleep without keeping one eye open.

English: Keep going! You need to defeat more Naga.
Simplified_Chinese: Keep going! You need to defeat more Naga.

English: Collect evidence of defeating at least 1000 Small Naga, Naga, or Captain Naga. After that, defeat the Lord Naga and Overlord Naga.
Simplified_Chinese: Collect evidence of defeating at least 1000 Small Naga, Naga, or Captain Naga. After that, defeat the Lord Naga and Overlord Naga.

English: Mission Improbable
Simplified_Chinese: Mission Improbable

English: Hahaha! I cannot thank you enough for all that you have done for our village, hero! Only the most powerful of masquerpets remain a threat to our village now.
Simplified_Chinese: Hahaha! I cannot thank you enough for all that you have done for our village, hero! Only the most powerful of masquerpets remain a threat to our village now.

English: We rarely see the Dorian and Okean creatures approach the village. However with so many other Island evils defeated, I fear they may leave their lair to take advantage of the situation!
Simplified_Chinese: We rarely see the Dorian and Okean creatures approach the village. However with so many other Island evils defeated, I fear they may leave their lair to take advantage of the situation!

English: Go seek out where the Dorian and Okean live. We'll need as much information as we can get if we expect to defeat them!
Simplified_Chinese: Go seek out where the Dorian and Okean live. We'll need as much information as we can get if we expect to defeat them!

English: What!? You can't possibly be scared of a few more masquerpets after all we've been through together!
Simplified_Chinese: What!? You can't possibly be scared of a few more masquerpets after all we've been through together!

English: Well done, hero! With this information we have a chance to defeat the Dorian and Okean before they can attack!
Simplified_Chinese: Well done, hero! With this information we have a chance to defeat the Dorian and Okean before they can attack!

English: Keep searching, the Dorian and Okean make their homes in the waters of Coral Island.
Simplified_Chinese: Keep searching, the Dorian and Okean make their homes in the waters of Coral Island.

English: Search for where the Dorian and Okean live.
Simplified_Chinese: Search for where the Dorian and Okean live.

English: Surprise Attack!
Simplified_Chinese: Surprise Attack!

English: HOOWAH! I'm trembling with excitement!
Simplified_Chinese: HOOWAH! I'm trembling with excitement!

English: With the information you've brought back, our village has a real chance to take down the Dorian and Okean before they get to us!
Simplified_Chinese: With the information you've brought back, our village has a real chance to take down the Dorian and Okean before they get to us!

English: Go ahead and defeat as many Dorian and Okean as you can find, including their leaders! We trust you to take down the leaders, we'll be helping with the smaller ones in the back.
Simplified_Chinese: Go ahead and defeat as many Dorian and Okean as you can find, including their leaders! We trust you to take down the leaders, we'll be helping with the smaller ones in the back.

English: If we wait too much longer the Dorian and Okean will attack the village!
Simplified_Chinese: If we wait too much longer the Dorian and Okean will attack the village!

English: It's been done, hero. We've defeated the Dorian and Okean, and can now rest easy.
Simplified_Chinese: It's been done, hero. We've defeated the Dorian and Okean, and can now rest easy.

English: We're doomed... without your help we will never defeat the Dorian and Okean in time!
Simplified_Chinese: We're doomed... without your help we will never defeat the Dorian and Okean in time!

English: Collect trophies from any defeated Dorian and Okean, and defeat at least one Lord or Overlord of each!
Simplified_Chinese: Collect trophies from any defeated Dorian and Okean, and defeat at least one Lord or Overlord of each!

English: Inky Darkness
Simplified_Chinese: Inky Darkness

English: I hope you are ready for our final challenge hero... According to legend, once every few hundred years the Sea King will release spawn onto Coral Island.
Simplified_Chinese: I hope you are ready for our final challenge hero... According to legend, once every few hundred years the Sea King will release spawn onto Coral Island.

English: A strange darkness has began to fill the waters of Coral Island, so it seems as if the legend is true.
Simplified_Chinese: A strange darkness has began to fill the waters of Coral Island, so it seems as if the legend is true.

English: Please help us stave off the spawn of the Sea King!
Simplified_Chinese: Please help us stave off the spawn of the Sea King!

English: Thank you! Find where the Sea King has released their spawn, and defeat as many as you can. Let BoBu know once you've finished!
Simplified_Chinese: Thank you! Find where the Sea King has released their spawn, and defeat as many as you can. Let BoBu know once you've finished!

English: Soon the inky darkness will overflow Coral Island, and we will be engulfed...
Simplified_Chinese: Soon the inky darkness will overflow Coral Island, and we will be engulfed...

English: Hohoho! You really do have a mysterious power within you, don't you hero?
Simplified_Chinese: Hohoho! You really do have a mysterious power within you, don't you hero?

English: Will we become faceless like those that failed before us?
Simplified_Chinese: Will we become faceless like those that failed before us?

English: Defeat 500 of any type of Kraken.
Simplified_Chinese: Defeat 500 of any type of Kraken.

English: The Sea King Returns
Simplified_Chinese: The Sea King Returns

English: The great Sea King of Coral Island has finally returned to wreck havoc upon the land.
Simplified_Chinese: The great Sea King of Coral Island has finally returned to wreck havoc upon the land.

English: The locals told me that getting near the beast could cause mortals to lose their mind...
Simplified_Chinese: The locals told me that getting near the beast could cause mortals to lose their mind...

English: This battle will take all the strength we can muster. If you make it out alive, go back to Darken City, and let the mayor know about all that happened here.
Simplified_Chinese: This battle will take all the strength we can muster. If you make it out alive, go back to Darken City, and let the mayor know about all that happened here.

English: The only path forward to end the curse of the Sea King is to slay the beast in its lair. Go forth and do the deed, for Coral Island!
Simplified_Chinese: The only path forward to end the curse of the Sea King is to slay the beast in its lair. Go forth and do the deed, for Coral Island!

English: Those who lose their mind to the Sea King are said to become faceless.
Simplified_Chinese: Those who lose their mind to the Sea King are said to become faceless.

English: Welcome back from Coral Island, hero! And what a story to tell, it's true that Coral Island is a fascinating place.
Simplified_Chinese: Welcome back from Coral Island, hero! And what a story to tell, it's true that Coral Island is a fascinating place.

English: BoBu and the Coral Island villagers sent something by mail for you as a way to say thanks. Perhaps they were too shy to give it to you themselves!
Simplified_Chinese: BoBu and the Coral Island villagers sent something by mail for you as a way to say thanks. Perhaps they were too shy to give it to you themselves!

English: The Sea King consumes all who look into the void.
Simplified_Chinese: The Sea King consumes all who look into the void.

English: Ultimate Crafting
Simplified_Chinese: Ultimate Crafting

English: Orbs of Power
Simplified_Chinese: Orbs of Power

English: Your arrival has come at a critical time, hero. Bring me Ultima, and in return I shall grant you the key to ultimate power.
Simplified_Chinese: Your arrival has come at a critical time, hero. Bring me Ultima, and in return I shall grant you the key to ultimate power.

English: Collect Ultima from the giant creatures that live on Coral Island, or from chests of plunder deep in The Wilds.
Simplified_Chinese: Collect Ultima from the giant creatures that live on Coral Island, or from chests of plunder deep in The Wilds.

English: Without Ultima I cannot grant the ultimate power you seek.
Simplified_Chinese: Without Ultima I cannot grant the ultimate power you seek.

English: Well done, hero... I bestow upon you the power of the Ultimate Orb. Combine this with Shining Oricalkum and obtain ultimate power!
Simplified_Chinese: Well done, hero... I bestow upon you the power of the Ultimate Orb. Combine this with Shining Oricalkum and obtain ultimate power!

English: I need more Ultima to complete the ritual.
Simplified_Chinese: I need more Ultima to complete the ritual.

English: Collect ten Ultima from the giants of Coral Island and treasure chests in The Wilds.
Simplified_Chinese: Collect ten Ultima from the giants of Coral Island and treasure chests in The Wilds.

English: New Hero
Simplified_Chinese: New Hero

English: Your will and ability have proven you to be a master in both thought and deed. Now that you've shown your true strength, it is time for your final task.
Simplified_Chinese: Your will and ability have proven you to be a master in both thought and deed. Now that you've shown your true strength, it is time for your final task.

English: I need you to reach level 125 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!
Simplified_Chinese: I need you to reach level 125 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!

English: Reach level 125 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.
Simplified_Chinese: Reach level 125 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.

English: New Year's Hunt
Simplified_Chinese: New Year's Hunt

English: Celebrating 2024, let's hunt 2024 monsters!\nWhat do you say?"
Simplified_Chinese: Celebrating 2024, let's hunt 2024 monsters!\nWhat do you say?"

English: "Great! I know you'll make it for sure!\nHere's to a new year full of adventures in 2024!!!"
Simplified_Chinese: "Great! I know you'll make it for sure!\nHere's to a new year full of adventures in 2024!!!"

English: "It's a shame, because I've got the best New Year's gift ever…"
Simplified_Chinese: "It's a shame, because I've got the best New Year's gift ever…"

English: "You've done great~ Here's your New Year's gift~\nLet's see how lucky you are this year!!!"
Simplified_Chinese: "You've done great~ Here's your New Year's gift~\nLet's see how lucky you are this year!!!"

English: "Are you still a long way off? We're running out of time! Please hurry up!"
Simplified_Chinese: "Are you still a long way off? We're running out of time! Please hurry up!"

English: Defeat the monsters and return to Auxilior.
Simplified_Chinese: Defeat the monsters and return to Auxilior.

English: Collecting Candy Shells
Simplified_Chinese: Collecting Candy Shells

English: Madrigal is being polluted by discarded candy shells everywhere!! We need your help!!
Simplified_Chinese: Madrigal is being polluted by discarded candy shells everywhere!! We need your help!!

English: Thank you so much!! I won't forget your help!!
Simplified_Chinese: Thank you so much!! I won't forget your help!!

English: I have a special gift for you, but it's a shame...
Simplified_Chinese: I have a special gift for you, but it's a shame...

English: I'm so proud to see Madrigal cleaned up~!
Simplified_Chinese: I'm so proud to see Madrigal cleaned up~!

English: Hang in there!!
Simplified_Chinese: Hang in there!!

English: Collect the candy shells and return to Auxilior.
Simplified_Chinese: Collect the candy shells and return to Auxilior.

English: Spring Monster Ball
Simplified_Chinese: Spring Monster Ball

English: Hello Adventurer! Would you like to take a suggestion about hunting a stronger monster?
Simplified_Chinese: Hello Adventurer! Would you like to take a suggestion about hunting a stronger monster?

English: Great! Show me what you can do first!
Simplified_Chinese: Great! Show me what you can do first!

English: That's too bad, please join us next time!
Simplified_Chinese: That's too bad, please join us next time!

English: Thank you. Here is your Monster Ball. Please be cautious!\nNo one knows what kind of powerful monster will come out.
